Job Titles: Search Global E-commerce Product Operations - Trust and Safety - Indonesia
Job Details:
Responsibilities

 About TikTok
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. 
---
Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.
---
About Trust and Safety
Building a world where people can safely discover, create and connect. The Trust & Safety (T&S) team at TikTok helps ensure that our global online community is safe and empowered to create and enjoy content across all of our applications. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.
---
About the team
The Search Operations team aims to improve search user experience, contribute significant DAU impact to the products and drive for increase in traffic and GMV.

It is possible that this role will be exposed to harmful content as part of the core role/as part of project/ in response to escalation requests/by chance.
Some content viewed may violate our community guidelines which include but are not limited to bullying; hate speech; child abuse; sexual assault; torture; bestiality; self-harm; suicide; murder.
---
Responsibilities
- Responsible for the optimization of e-commerce project search recommendation/evaluation/labeling projects, able to deeply understand users' search intentions, and combine output strategies such as local culture and user usage habits to ensure online user search experience.
- Work closely with the central team, local team, Product RD team, and PM team to adjust search strategy, formulate strategy recommendation/evaluation/labeling standards, accurately analyze cases, and drive continuous optimization of search strategy.
- Responsible for the alignment and application of various e-commerce rules in the search scenario, and responsible for its accuracy and rationality.
- Participate in the planning of e-commerce projects and undertake the needs of the search side, and follow up the guideline update and training process to ensure that they meet expectations.
- Willing to work with sensitive issues that include child exploitation, a variety of religious and political views, violence, adult & sexual content. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications
- 3 years of experience in product operations/product management/project management direction in tech/internet companies.
- Fluency in English and Bahasa Indonesia is required. English will be utilized as the primary language for work, while Bahasa Indonesia will be used for market-specific communications.
- Knowledge of common data management/office software.
---
Preferred Qualifications
- Professional work experience in companies related to search engines, social media platforms, e-commerce, or other local apps.
- Possession of a Bachelor's degree or higher.
- An in-depth understanding of local culture and familiarity with the Internet usage habits of local users.
- Background/past experience in team management.
---
Trust & Safety recognises that keeping our platform safe for TikTok communities is no ordinary job which can be both rewarding and psychologically demanding and emotionally taxing for some. This is why we are sharing the potential hazards, risks and implications in this unique line of work from the start, so our candidates are well informed before joining. We are committed to the wellbeing of all our employees and promise to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.
---
TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
---
Skill: Bahasa Indonesia, Communication, English, Marketing, Product Operations, Research Skills, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engines, Social Media, and Web Analytics

Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.

The Search Operations team aims to improve search user experience, contribute significant DAU impact to the products and drive for increase in traffic and GMV.

The team plays a vital role in analyzing user searches and search strategy optimization to ensure a positive and safe user experience for our community.

- Analyze the difference between search-type results such as goods, videos, hashtags, or users and rate the quality of these results based on policies.
- Provide ideal search results and feedback suggestions for policy improvement.
- While it is assumed the evaluator will focus on their area of expertise, there will be occasions in which he/she will work on projects outside this core area that could require other capabilities, such as using assessment methods flexibly to support related projects.

- 1 year of experience as a Content Specialist or Content Reviewer.

Preferred Qualifications:
- You have completed a Bachelor's degree or above.
- Experience in Search Evaluation.
- Knowledge about search engines, the best way to be engaged with TikTok, and familiarity with shopping apps, local apps, or internet companies.
- Excellent identifying problems, problem-solving skills, and learning abilities.

Job Details:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!





Job Description

The Senior Copywriter is an integral sense-making designer who crafts copy or content for users when using our digital product. He/she advocates the importance of humanizing digital products through words, that words are nuanced, and that without words, our products would be faceless shapes with no mood nor tone of voice. He/she ensures users have the most delightful experience possible with the words he/she uses to guide their experience through the journey on our site and app.

A problem solver, the Senior Copywriter has special knack for digital user interface (UI) copy and content, obsession with clarity, concern for space, interest in the visual placement of the information, and a sufficient understanding of how websites and apps are built. The latter helps him/her anticipate the copy that is needed, think up of all the possible scenarios a user may embark on and make that

Whole Experience Make Sense.

The Senior Copywriter conducts design research by delivering research context and requirements based on research objectives, and synthesize data to draw conclusions that drive content (copy and visual) effectiveness.

In addition, he/she demonstrates strong interpersonal, prioritization, and stakeholder management skills in collaborating with product team, engineers, interaction designers, visual designers and various other roles. Not only that he/she is collaborative, the Senior

Copywriter brings empathy to the foreground of our efforts by understanding how a user is feeling and what their needs are while interacting with our products.

To obtain optimal product fit and quality, he/she is able to work on multiple tasks concurrently, possibly getting involved across end-to-end project phases, and deliver on expectations within deadlines, with high level of changes and iterations required. In addition, he/she demonstrates stakeholder management skills in partnering with internal stakeholders to develop high quality creative solutions that meet overall business objectives and goals.



Requirements

Minimum qualifications

Between 5–7 years overall work experience as a hands-on Writer in the industry (education background could range from Creative Writing, Journalism, Marketing & Communication, or any other relevant disciplines; or Human-Computer Interaction, Computer Science, Design, or other related field, with equivalent practical design experience). 
Portfolio that showcases copywriting craft (and its application of copywriting principles) with some level of understanding of the Human Centered Design methodology (along with its methods and tools), willingness to learn and iterate, and passionate about design and storytelling. 
Experience working with web or mobile based products and services, and producing copies for digital product and/or content and/or marketing communications. 
Excellent in Indonesian and English communications (both verbal and written). A deep sense of accountability, adaptability, and embracing ambiguity working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. 

Preferred Qualifications

An evidence of performing in a multidisciplinary design, business, and tech team is a plus. 
Some understanding of the eCommerce and/or digital travel and lifestyle industries, extra points for having successfully deliver products in/for the SE Asia and/or regional markets. 
The ability to form consensus across a broad, fast-moving organization through excellent communication and interpersonal skills (including: negotiation, constructive feedback, presentation, managing expectations, resolve conflicts). 
Effective integration of copy with design sensibilities as they relate to applying a brand to digital experiences.



If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!
Skill: Constructive Feedback, Content Strategy, Copywriting, Creative Problem Solving, Creative Writing, Interpersonal Skills, Presentations, Stakeholder Management, Storytelling, and Tone of Voice

Job Summary

Responsible for completing marketing plan for property. Manages all e-commerce opportunities. Develops a good working relationship with tourism bureaus and community leaders.

CANDIDATE PROFILE 

Education And Experience

 High school diploma or GED; 2 years experience in the sales and marketing or related professional area. 

OR

 2-year degree from an accredited university in Marketing, Business Administration, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; no work experience required. 

CORE WORK ACTIVITIES

Conducting Daily Marketing Activities that Achieve Department Goals

 Assists in region-wide coordination of rooms, food and beverage, spa, and golf promotions. 
 Develops leisure marketing plan that addresses the distribution of rate offers, packages and programs designed to build occupancy. 
 Maintains, updates, and manages all web sites. 
 Coordinates offers and information for all publications and inserts with regard to brand loyalty reward mailings. 
 Develops brochure and property collateral materials. 
 Participates in all property imaging work (e.g., signage). 
 Uses and interprets all reporting necessary for sound marketing recommendations, including but not limited to DMA source market reports, past guest lists (utilizing leisure rate codes) and tracking.

 Manages marketing budget throughout year. 
 Provides regular tracking/ROI and analysis of promotions and website/email campaigns, using industry averages for ROI calculation, and uses this knowledge in future planning. 
 Tracks return on investment (ROI) of all marketing initiatives, including online, direct mail and print advertising.

Using Knowledge of Market Trends and Target Customer Information to Maximize Revenue

Building Successful Relationships that Generate Sales & Marketing Opportunities

Additional Marketing Responsibilities

Competitive Salary

Job Titles: Developer Relations Engineer, Google Cloud (Bahasa, English)
Job Details:
Minimum qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
5 years of work experience in a technical role (e.g., software engineering, solutions consultant, etc.) or equivalent technical experience.
Experience as a Software Developer, Architect, Technical Advocate, or Community/Product Manager, working with various platforms.
Experience consulting customers with cloud technologies and engaging with developer communities.
Experience in ML and AI including GenAI and guiding developers on the use of these technologies.
Ability to communicate in Bahasa and English fluently as the role supports the local and global developer community.

Preferred qualifications:

Experience in a large volume of work in AI/ML and are well respected in the AI/ML community of practice.
Experience speaking at technology conferences, blogging/writing technical articles, creating code samples, or contributing to open source projects.
Ability to collaborate with globally distributed teams and influence technical practitioners and stakeholders.
Ability to grow in ambiguity and prioritize effectively amidst a rapidly changing, high-demand environment.
Ability to travel within APAC and up to 30% of the time.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

About The Job

Passionate people are everywhere at Google. In Developer Relations, we get excited to collaborate and connect with the communities that love technology as much as we do. Part community manager and part developer advocate, Developer Programs Engineers collaborate with developers at conferences and online, and advocate for developers interests internally at Google. Not afraid to be hands-on, you write sample code and client libraries as well as participate in developer forums and support queues to troubleshoot and debug coding problems developers encounter. Internally, you work with product engineering teams improve our products by conveying feedback from developers, reviewing API designs and testing new features. Chrome, Android, App Engine, HTML5 as well as our core Google Apps and Ads APIs are just some of the platforms you promote and support.

With your technical expertise, you drive strategy around fostering a community of developers who work with Google technologies. An ardent advocate for these developers, you represent their voice internally to our Product Managers and serve as their Google support in application development and technology implementation.

As a Developer Relations Engineer, you’ll join a team of Practitioners that empathize deeply with external technical communities, and advocate on their behalf to the Google Cloud Product and Engineering teams, ensuring that our products are built to meet the community's needs and that they provide the best possible user and developer experiences. You’ll raise awareness of Cloud technologies and methodologies within our technical communities. You’ll use your practitioner knowledge and empathy for community in order to define product strategies and to craft narratives around new products and technologies.

Responsibilities

Advocate for the community internally and influence Google Cloud product strategy by working with cross-functional teams. Support an inclusive work environment.
Provoke and synthesize feedback and sentiment in order to drive continuous improvement to Google Cloud Platform products and to the overall experience of the platform had by technical practitioners.
Participate in technical communities as a practitioner having, or developing, deep understanding of that community’s needs. Build and foster an external ‘community ecosystem’ of influencers, meetups, experts that amplify our messages and extend our reach.
Represent the needs of relevant technical communities throughout the entire product lifecycle, including input on design discussions, customer zero testing, launch, post-launch updates.
Work with Product and Engineering teams to define product strategies and to craft narratives around new products and features.


Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .
Skill: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Community of Practice, Computer Science, Developer Relations, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Google Technologies, Large Volume, Machine Learning, Open-Source Software, and Software Development

Job Details:
At Catalyst, People are the heartbeat of our company. We believe that good quality people will have a positive impact on our business. We are looking for a UX Writer to join our growing team. If you are passionate about being part of the team, building some of the most critical products, and Working alongside teams in the industry across product, engineering, and design, Let’s join us!

Job Description

Craft clear, concise, and engaging copy for all user interfaces, ensuring a seamless user experience across our e-commerce platform.
Collaborate with product designers, developers, and other stakeholders to create user-centered content that enhances the overall design and usability.

Stay informed about industry best practices and emerging trends in UX writing and content strategy.

Requirements

Proven experience as a UX Writer, preferably in the e-commerce or digital product industry.
Strong portfolio showcasing your ability to write clear, user-focused copy for digital products.
Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills with a keen eye for detail.
Understanding of UX principles and user-centered design methodologies.
Ability to conduct user research and apply insights to improve content.
Proficiency with design tools like Figma.
Strong collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams.

Job Details:
Introduction

As a Package Consultant at IBM, get ready to tackle numerous mission-critical company directives. Our team takes on the challenge of designing, developing and re-engineering highly complex application components and integrating software packages using various tools. You will use a mix of consultative skills, business knowledge, and technical expertise to effectively integrate packaged technology into our clients' business environment and achieve business results.

Your Role and Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities

A Salesforce Functional Consultant is responsible for analysing the business needs of clients and designing solutions within Salesforce to address those needs. The job involves close interaction with clients, understanding their business processes, and customizing Salesforce applications to enhance their operations. Here is a detailed job description:


Client Engagement:
Engage with clients to understand their business requirements and challenges.
Lead discovery workshops and facilitate discussions to define business processes.
Solution Design:
Translate business requirements into Salesforce solutions using industry best practices.
Create and maintain detailed functional designs and configure Salesforce systems accordingly.
Collaborate with Salesforce developers to ensure requirements are met with functional and technical design.
Project Delivery:
Ensure successful implementation of Salesforce solutions, meeting client’s business requirements.
Manage and execute end-to-end delivery of Salesforce projects, from requirements gathering to final deployment.
Guide the client through UAT (User Acceptance Testing), ensuring that the solution meets the business needs.
Training and Support:
Develop and deliver Salesforce training to end-users.
Provide post-implementation support and troubleshooting.
Best Practices and Standards:
Keep abreast of new Salesforce features and functionality and providing recommendations for process improvements.
Maintain documentation related to processes, policies, application configurations, and business needs.
Team Collaboration:
Work collaboratively with the implementation team, including Project Managers, Technical Architects, Business Analysts, and Developers.
Mentor junior consultants and contribute to the team’s knowledge base.


Required Technical and Professional Expertise


Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Business, or a related field.
Salesforce certification (e.g., Salesforce Certified Administrator, Salesforce Certified Advanced Administrator, Salesforce Certified Sales Cloud Consultant, etc.).
Proven experience in Salesforce configuration, and understanding of the overall capabilities of Salesforce.
Experience in a consulting or Salesforce implementation role.
Strong understanding of Salesforce declarative development and the ability to balance the use of out-of-the-box features with custom coding. 


Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise

As above.

About Business Unit

IBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.

Your Life @ IBM

In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.

Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.

Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.

Are you ready to be an IBMer?

About IBM

IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.

Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business.

At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

Location Statement

For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.
Skill: Acceptance Testing, Business Process, Business Requirements, Enterprise Solution Design, Requirements Gathering, Salesforce.com, Solution Architecture, Technical Design, Technical Solution Design, and User Acceptance Testing

Job Details:
To solve the biggest challenges of our time, we need bright minds with the ambition to make the impossible possible. Siemens is your place to thrive, challenge the status quo, make a difference and grow in a team of innovators who share your passion for tech.

In this role, you will lead the successful implementation of the business strategy, utilizing a transformational sales approach that combines automation and digitalization solutions to gain market share and customer satisfaction, while also guiding the organization's transition into Industry 4.0 technologies.

You will make an impact in the following

Develop and implement the Digital Transformation Strategy by enhancing the technical and delivery ecosystem with consulting, digitally integrated system implementation, and IoT-based optimization services. 
Lead the Sales & Market Development team to develop business strategies, increase industry engagement, and analyze market trends, competition, and regulatory changes to adapt strategies accordingly. 
Operation Management and Risk Mitigation through the identification, definition, and execution of suitable measures. 
Change Management and Talent Development, managing the organization's transition from a traditional to a digital portfolio, focusing on talent acquisition, development, and retention. 
Collaboration with Business Units to formulate joint Tech and Customer Service strategies. 

You’re excited to build on your existing expertise, including 

At least 10 years of experience, a Master's Degree in Business or Engineering, and expertise in discrete manufacturing, hybrid, process industries, advanced manufacturing, and international management. 
Strong analytical skills, expertise in digitalization, organizational change management, and the ability to develop planning and forecasting models for regional business unit integration and sales growth. 
Experience in Industrial Automation, Product lifecycle management, Manufacturing operations management, Cloud-based business models, project, service, digitalization, engineering business line, and developing partner management strategies and ecosystem. 
Experienced digital thought leader with excellent interpersonal skills, passionate about Industry 4.0 technologies like AI, additive manufacturing, cloud, industrial edge, 5G, and Blockchain. 
Ability to build new sustainable business models and revenue streams with a digital portfolio. 

Siemens Digital Industries (DI) is an innovation leader in automation and digitalization. Closely collaborating with partners and customers, we drive the digital transformation in the process and discrete industries. With our Digital Enterprise portfolio, we are able to provide companies of all sizes with an end-to-end set of products, solutions and services to integrate and digitalize the entire value chain. Optimized for the specific needs of each industry, our outstanding portfolio supports customers to achieve greater efficiency and flexibility. We are constantly adding innovations to its portfolio to integrate groundbreaking future technologies.

Create a better #TomorrowWithUs!

Job title:
Provides technical expertise through sales presentations, product/solutions demonstrations, installation and maintenance of company products, solutions and services.

Your role:
Modality Manager DXR is the knowledge expert on Diagnostic X-Ray product, who supports Account Managers in driving overall business and product deal support by providing clinical and technical product (modality) expertise on the product / modality across the accounts.
Participates in defining and controlling of the implementation of the business policy, pricing strategy and product/modality to be sold by the BU in the region, according to established guidelines.
Support and handle channel sales such as sales/dealer training, customer presentation (technical and clinical), user support etc.
Be critical part of the sales management such as configuration, quotation, customer presentation, sales tools.
Working together with Sales team, Modality Manager informs and recommend customers the latest technological innovations developed and its associated configurations, including the possible upgrades of the installed base, attending the complaints and inquiries made, to obtain a higher level of customer satisfaction and contribute to achieve the sales targets.
Assists Sales Team with customer presentations specifically focused on the clinical and technical components of the value proposition. Understand and address competitive positioning and marketing strategy of respective product / modality and supports where needed in identification of the tender strategy and quotation.
Supports the Account managers and District Managers in achievement of business goals including balanced selling and BG/BIU AOP attainment and validating product forecasts.
Partners with Marketing to with input on sales tools, pricing issues and competitive threats which enable Marketing to best support the Specialists and provide input to the BG/BIU
Prepares and delivers accurate business forecasting on a monthly via accurate lead and opportunity management.
Monitor competition and changes in the industry and provides effective feedback to the sales and marketing organizations that include suggestions for expanding product offerings.
Drives continuous improvements via Lean. 
Responsible for sales of the assigned product modalities & develops and executes strategic, tactical sales plans and gives input for district strategy.
Identifies new business opportunities & working with Account team to achieve services sales quotas.

You're the right fit if:
Degree holder with more than 5-year experience as product Manager in healthcare industries.
In-depth knowledge of healthcare industry fundamental and landscape in Indonesia.
Strong presentation, communication skills with consultative selling ability, as well as follow up skills.
Excellent technical and clinical understanding of Diagnostic X-Ray/Imaging product.
Proven ability to work effectively within a team-selling environment.
Analytical and conceptual strategic thinker, preferably with previous track record of developing and implementing sound business plans and product/market strategies.
Previous track record in anticipating market changes and responding by adjusting the product/ service offering is a plus.
Excellent communication in Bahasa Indonesia and English both oral and written.

By growing and innovating our global portfolio of category-leading brands – including Sensodyne, Panadol, Voltaren, and many more – through a unique combination of deep human understanding and trusted science. What’s more, we’re achieving it in an environment that we’re co-creating and a culture that’s uniquely ours. Care to join us. It isn’t a question.

Job Details:
Job Description

Indonesia is a strategic growth geography where the Levi’s® brand expression, visibility and awareness are critical given the high level of competition from Premium lifestyle brands to vertically integrated brands such as Uniqlo. For that reason, we are looking for a pioneering, innovative and savvy brand builder who has mastered both the art and science of consumer funnel marketing.

Job Purpose & Key Metrics

Unleash Levi’s® equity as the denim leader to be the No.1 destination for Fashion Apparel in Indonesia.
Own the country marketing plan and budgets, to deliver against Global and cluster priorities, activate and drives the Country business to achieve the Annual Plan. 
Drive best and next in class brand activations that generates hype, strengthen favorability and grow consumer demand (especially Youth and Women)

Job Scope

Own, lead planning and implement Indonesia’s annual marketing and brand calendar.
Leverage 360 funnel activations and content marketing in paid, earned and owned channels.
Lead planning and execution of PR calendar in line with brand strategy, strong content creator plans and annual event calendar to propel Levi’s® above social clutter and noise.
Lead planning and execution of brand paid media and performance marketing to ensure consistent full funnel brand reach, recall and visibility - effectively strengthen consideration and convert prospects to traffic online and offline.
Lead planning and execution of CRM & loyalty marketing to build transactional and emotional loyalty that nurtures a highly-engaged database and grow annual customer lifetime value.
Oversight of in-store brand experience to plan and align key campaign moments to ensure seamless and effective consumer shopping journey in-store.
Accountability to manage country A&P budget and deliver annual plans and KPIs.
Forge effective and collaborative partnership with multi-faceted stakeholders both internal and external. 
Be the go-to consult and uphold the responsibility for brand and marketing decisions that answers to “Best for Brand” “Best for Consumer” “Best for Business”.
Nurture and leverage deep understanding and curiosity of local consumer insights based on Levi’s® primary target audience and share to business and cross-function teams.
Harness the ability to spot now and next trends for market-led executions that are brand right.
Passion for data and KPI-obsessed – drives the highest accountability amongst teams.
Prepares and shares timely marketing performance tracking, monthly business reviews, A&P budget forecast and share of best and next practices for the market and SEA.
Involve and actively partake in Indonesia country forums.
Support Indonesia trade marketing engagement with key Franchise and Wholesale partners to strengthen confidence and identify big bet partnership opportunities for win-win activations.
Nurture and build a high-performing marketing team.

Critical Results

High performing and engaged senior leadership team member.
Well-grounded business and credible all-rounder marketing expert
Well-executed annual marketing plan that enhances brand favorability, equity, engagement and excitement to grow consumer demand.
Well-planned annual A&P budget that balances high impact brand activations while delivering on performance ROI for the brand.
Well-managed with efficient go-to-market process, partnering cross-functional teams effectively.
Build a highly competent, cohesive, and consumer-focused team supported by the implementation of performance management, development planning, coaching and mentoring.

Key Responsibilities Include But Are Not Limited To

Marketing team coaching and development.
Directs execution of all marketing & brand plans; ensures plans deliver against the brief and are consistent with Levi’s® positioning, priorities and guidelines.
Lead and manage local activations and key big bet programs successfully.
Lead all activities pertaining to raising brand awareness, strengthen consideration and purchase to establish Levi’s® as the No. 1 Fashion & Apparel brand in Indonesia.
Manages internal and external relationships to share performance and data
Delivers local relevant understanding of marketplace dynamics, consumer insights, learning from previous marketing activations, to drive continued innovation and ensure effectiveness.
Effectively collaborate with cluster (East Asia Pacific) and sub-cluster (South-East Asia) marketing community to co-create and co-share marketing activations.
Contributes to the improvement of key marketing processes (e.g., planning, brief, reporting and communications)
Diligent management and monitoring of country A&P budget to ensure a well-balanced spend achieved between short, mid to long-term objectives, as necessary to achieve brand and business objectives.

Competencies

The Indonesia Marketing Lead will have proven ability to demonstrate the following:

Creative and inspiring all-rounder marketing expert
Pioneering and innovative – comfortable and controlled risk taker, open to test and learn
Effective communication skills to facilitate collaboration, influence & stakeholder management
Strategic thinker with strong analytical capability with a data driven mindset.
Good knowledge of operating in a matrix and global organisation
Strong business acumen and experience with budget management
High-level problem solving skills and a sense of urgency and versatility with decision making
Accountability for results and the drive for mutual success for internal and external partners
Planning and execution: establish plans, manage and improve process, drive execution
Drive for global leverage with an ability to challenge when appropriate

Qualifications & Functional Competencies

The Indonesia Marketing Lead will be qualified in Marketing, Business Management or similar discipline with min. 8 years proven experience in the following:

Consumer Insights and data analytics
Customer journey and funnel marketing
Social media and content/creator marketing
PR & Media relations
Event development and conceptualization
CRM and loyalty marketing
Performance marketing and ecommerce
Finance and accounting management
Brand Protection and Use of Trademarks

LOCATION

Indonesia, Jakarta - Office

FULL TIME/PART TIME

Full time

Current LS&Co Employees, apply via your Workday account.
Skill: Accounting Management, Activations, Budget Management, Business Management, Business Reviews, Content Marketing, Key Metrics, Media Relations, Performance Marketing, and Strategic Thinking

Job Details:
Nice to Meet You! We are Dropsuite!

In this role, you will be responsible for leading the design of user interface and user experience solutions for our Cloud SaaS Software products. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure successful product development and execution, and to drive user engagement and satisfaction.

Work Arrangement
Full-time position
Hybrid work model (2 days per week in the office)
Monday to Friday, 5-day work week (flexible work schedule)
Eligible to reside and work in Bandung (Indonesian citizenship only)

Key Accountabilities
Leadership & Strategy: Develop and implement design strategies that align with company goals, driving innovation and excellence in UI/UX design.
Team Management: Lead and manage the UI/UX design team, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment. Oversee team performance, provide regular feedback, and support professional development.
Performance Metrics: Establish and track key performance metrics to measure the effectiveness and impact of UI/UX design initiatives.
Resource Allocation: Ensure efficient allocation of design resources to meet project demands and deadlines.
Design Guidelines: Define and own the company's design guidelines and standards, ensuring consistency and quality across all products.
Lead and Innovate: Design user interfaces and experiences for our Cloud SaaS products, creating wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs that set industry standards.
User-Centric Approach: Conduct user research and gather feedback to inform design decisions, ensuring user satisfaction and engagement.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with product management and engineering teams to drive successful product development and execution.
Stakeholder Communication: Communicate design concepts and solutions effectively to stakeholders, incorporating feedback to refine and perfect designs.
Industry Awareness: Stay current with industry trends and best practices in UI/UX design, applying this knowledge to continuously improve our product designs.
Project Management: Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality outcomes.

Qualifications and Competencies
5+ years of experience as a UX Architect and Manager
10+ years of experience in UI/UX design or related field
Experience conducting large scale user research programs
Data driven approach to design
Proven track record of designing B2B or Enterprise products for scale
Bachelor's degree in graphic design, Interaction Design, or related field; Master's degree preferred
Strong portfolio demonstrating proficiency in UI/UX design and leadership skills
Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, and Figma
Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously
Passion for technology and product innovation

Why Join Us
Dropsuite (listed DSE:ASX) safeguards business information. We are a global, fast-growing, partner-centric company building secure, scalable, and highly usable cloud backup technologies for businesses. Our mission is to help businesses stay in business. Dropsuite performs billions of backups per day for organizations in more than 100 countries around the globe.

Dropsuite is known for its team of ‘hungry owners.’ We are hungry to win and tenacious, but at the same time we all are owners: we do not cut corners and always seek to do the right thing. We are experts in what we do, are highly customer focused and we love solving problems. We play as a team, where respect is one of our key values and we see helping others as a priority. 

What we offer
Competitive compensation
Health insurance for you and your dependents
Social Security (BPJS Ketenagakerjaan)
Hybrid work model
12 Days of Annual Leave
Entitled to Indonesia Public Holidays
Other leave benefits, such as Wedding leave
Growth opportunities
Work in a global company with meaningful work, highly skilled colleagues and an amazing culture

Diversity and Inclusion Statement
Dropsuite is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status.

Please note that only applicants residing and eligible to work in Bandung Indonesia will be considered and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Your Career Growth Starts Here. Apply Now!
Skill: Design Guidelines, Multiple Projects Simultaneously, Performance Metrics, Portfolio Management, Resource Allocation, Stakeholder Relations, Team Performance, User Experience (UX), User Experience Design (UED), and User Interface Design

Job Details:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Kami mencari Manajer Media Sosial dengan penempatan di Kota Surabaya yang kreatif dan berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di Stay.vie Living dan Tax Plus Indonesia, mengelola dua brand yang berbeda. Dalam peran ini, Anda akan bertanggung jawab mengelola dan meningkatkan kehadiran kami di berbagai platform media sosial. Tugas Anda akan meliputi perencanaan, pengembangan, dan implementasi strategi konten yang konsisten dan berdampak, dengan tujuan memperkuat brand kami di kalangan target audiens, khususnya generasi muda. Di Stay.vie Living dan Tax Plus Indonesia, Anda akan didukung oleh Videografer dan Desainer Grafis yang akan membantu dalam pembuatan konten baik video maupun foto. Fokus Anda akan pada penjadwalan posting, mengikuti perkembangan tren TikTok dan Instagram Reels, serta memimpin tim videografi dan desain grafis secara kreatif untuk memastikan konten kami tetap segar dan menarik.


Tanggung Jawab
Mengembangkan dan melaksanakan strategi konten yang konsisten dan berorientasi brand di semua platform media sosial, dengan fokus khusus pada TikTok dan Instagram Reels.
Menciptakan dan mengelola konten yang berkualitas dan berdampak, termasuk teks, gambar, dan video, dengan penekanan pada format yang optimal untuk TikTok dan Reels.
Menjaga jadwal posting media sosial yang sering dan teratur untuk meningkatkan engagement, khususnya di platform yang populer di kalangan generasi muda.
Berinteraksi aktif dengan followers dan menjawab pertanyaan atau komentar di media sosial, dengan respons yang cepat dan tepat di TikTok dan Instagram.
Mengkoordinasikan dan mengelola program influencer, termasuk kehadiran di event, dengan fokus pada influencer yang memiliki pengaruh kuat di TikTok dan Instagram.
Menggunakan dan menguasai tools analitik seperti Google Analytics, Hootsuite Pro, dan Facebook Insights, serta tools khusus untuk TikTok dan Instagram untuk melacak kinerja dan perkembangan strategi media sosial.
Keahlian dalam mengelola kampanye iklan berbayar di Google dan Facebook merupakan nilai tambah yang signifikan, memberikan kemampuan untuk meningkatkan visibilitas dan engagement melalui iklan yang efektif.
Memiliki pengetahuan tentang praktik terbaik SEO dan kemampuan untuk mengoptimalkan konten untuk mesin pencari sangat dihargai. Keterampilan ini penting untuk meningkatkan ranking organik dan memastikan konten mudah ditemukan oleh target audiens.
Menyiapkan laporan berkala tentang performa media sosial, dengan analisis mendalam tentang tren konten dan engagement di TikTok dan Instagram Reels.
Spesialisasi dalam mengikuti dan menerapkan tren terkini yang populer di kalangan Gen-Z dan Millennials, terutama di TikTok dan Instagram Reels, untuk memastikan konten selalu relevan dan menarik.
Kemahiran dalam merancang dan mengembangkan website serta landing page yang responsif dan user-friendly, memperkuat keberadaan online dan mendukung strategi pemasaran digital keseluruhan.


Kualifikasi
Gelar diploma atau sarjana di bidang Komunikasi, Pemasaran, atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman minimal 2 tahun sebagai Social Media Manager atau posisi serupa.
Gen-Z / Millenials menjadi plus poin
Kefasihan dalam menggunakan platform media sosial dan kepekaan terhadap tren terkini.
Kemampuan komunikasi yang kuat, termasuk menulis, editing, dan storytelling.
Keahlian dalam menggunakan berbagai tools digital dan analitik untuk media sosial.
Kemampuan desain dasar dan pemahaman tentang komputer dan software terkait (misal WordPress).
Kemampuan berpikir cepat dan adaptasi dengan tren yang berubah dengan cepat.
Manajemen waktu yang efisien dengan kemampuan untuk mengatur prioritas tugas dengan baik.


Cara Melamar
Kirimkan CV dan portofolio berupa link ke sini (website LinkedIn) dan atau Anda dapat email ke stevielie@stayvie.com. Sertakan juga beberapa contoh konten yang telah Anda buat atau kelola yang menunjukkan keahlian dan kreativitas Anda.
Skill: Content Management, Content Strategy, Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Influencer Marketing, Online Advertising, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Social Media Marketing, Social Media Optimization (SMO), and Tiktok Marketing

Job Description

Business System Analysts at Traveloka are the brains behind the business process. You will look over and propose data flow, data modeling, reporting, and system automation to integrate our products with our finance tools. Support for product integration, financial reporting, month-end-closing, and audits are included. You will support business users in handling current and new scenarios to ensure the business runs smoothly, supporting continued innovation. Diagnosing business processes will troubleshoot integration complexities when the frontend data is sent to the backend systems. Additional analysis to support data anomaly resolution, fraud, and other issues encountered form part of the core responsibility for this role. You must be able to interact with product managers, finance personnel, and engineering teams of all levels of seniority.



Requirements

Possess Bachelor Degree from a reputable University in computer science, information technology, or information system.
At least 3 years experience in complex system implementation, including project planning & tracking, requirement gathering, impact assessment & analysis, translate business/finance requirement to system logic, testing, & documentation
Excellent knowledge of database design, process flow diagram & query language
Basic understanding of programming logic to liaise with engineering counterparts
Ability to read code to investigate bug or identify changes needed in a project
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
English proficiency is a must both in written and verbal
Experience with a technology company, startup or consulting desired
Must understand common technology for custom and packaged applications
Knowledgeable in financial reporting and accounting practices is a plus
Experience with financial audit is a plus



If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!
Skill: Analytical Skills, Business Requirements, Business Systems, Communication, Computer Science, Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA), Process Flow Diagrams, Project Planning, Requirements Gathering, and Systems Analysis

Job Titles: Staff Software Engineer Back End (Bangkok based – Relocation provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

 Get to Know our Team 

In Agoda’s Back-End Engineering department, we build scalable, fault-tolerant systems and APIs that host our core business logic. Our systems cover all major areas of our business: inventory and pricing, product information, customer data, communications, partner data, booking systems, payments, and more. We employ state-of-the-art CI/CD and testing techniques to ensure everything works without downtime. Our systems are self-healing, responding gracefully to extreme loads or unexpected input. We use modern languages like Kotlin and Scala, Data technologies Kafka, Spark, MLflow, Kubeflow, VastStorage, StarRocks and agile development practices. Most importantly, we hire great people from around the world and empower them to be successful.

 The Opportunity 

Agoda Platform team is looking for developers to work on mission-critical systems that serve millions of users daily. You will have the chance to work on innovative projects, using cutting-edge technologies, and make a significant impact on our business and the travel industry.

What You’ll Need To Succeed

 8+ years of experience developing performance-critical applications in a production environment using Scala, Java, Kotlin, C#, Go or relevant modern programming languages. 
 Strong RDBMS knowledge (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, or other). 
 Ability to direct significant company-wide projects and sets technical vision. 
 Good command of the English language. 
 Deeply involved in making architectural decisions, setting the standard and direction for the team. 
 Implement advanced CI/CD pipelines and robust testing strategies to ensure seamless integration, deployment, and high code quality. 
 Passion for software development and continuous improvement of your knowledge and skills. 

 It’s Great if You Have 

 Knowledge in NoSQL, Queueing systems (Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, MSMQ), and Play framework.

Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

 Get to Know our Team:  Agoda’s front-end teams focus on various product aspects including accommodations, flights, and payments. We build localized, optimized user experiences globally across mobile websites, native apps, and desktop sites, fostering innovation and constant improvement through data-driven practices.

 The Opportunity:  As a Lead Software Engineer (Front End) at Agoda, you will drive the technological evolution of our front-end systems. You will be responsible for architecting, implementing, and optimizing user interfaces that enhance the user experience for millions of travelers worldwide. This position requires a deep understanding of front-end development principles, a passion for crafting exceptional user experiences, and expertise in various front-end technologies.

 In this role, you’ll get to: 

 Lead the design and development of highly distributed, large-scale front-end applications. 
 Drive collaboration with product managers, product designers, and engineers to design, implement, and improve scalable applications and services. 
 Serve as a front-end expert on large-scale projects, providing technical guidance and mentorship. 
 Hands-on development of proof of concepts and evaluation of new technologies. 
 Implement technical, strategic decisions in cross-functional teams. 
 Leading in building a culture that optimizes applications using best practices for performance. 
 Maintaining coding standards and staying up-to-date to industry and technology development. 
 Part of strategic discussion relating to Agoda’s future technology directions and development practices. 
 Contribute to the professional development of the team. 

 What you’ll Need to Succeed: 

 10+ years of software development experience in building large scale web application, with a minimum of 3 years in a Tech Lead role. 
 Proven experience designing, building, improving, and operating high-performance, scalable front-end systems. 
 Extensive experience with client-side technologies & modern frameworks (e.g., Javascript, Typescript, React). 
 Eager to work in multiple programming languages and frameworks, constantly striving to raise technical excellence. 
 Experience mentoring and growing Senior and Staff engineers through thorough and convincing communication. 
 Provides technical direction within and across groups by leading projects and building systems with company-wide impact. 
 Strong understanding of the business and how their systems impact the bottom line; able to redirect the team based on business priorities. 
 Constantly read and learn, moving Agoda forward technically, influencing other teams, and proactively improving others. 

 It’s great if you have: 

 Knowledge of physical architecture at scale, building resilience and highly available solutions. 
 Strong experience in all aspects of client-side performance optimization. 
 Proficiency in modern coding and design practices. For example, Clean Code, SOLID principals, and TDD. 
 Knowledge of back-end technologies and how they integrate with front-end systems. 

This position is based in Bangkok, Thailand (Relocation Provided)

Job Titles: Lead Software Engineer – Back End (FinTech) (Bangkok based – Relocation provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

 Get to Know Our Team 

Fintech is one of the fastest growing areas in Agoda and we are rapidly expanding our tech team. We work closely with the finance business team and our Fintech product owners to reduce risk, drive efficiencies and move on new market opportunities in this exciting field. We have a wide range of projects from traditional finance to cutting-edge customer fintech. For example, reconciliation using Big Data technologies, growing and optimizing customer payments options, tax calculations in milli-second response times and a mesh of supplier payment options like virtual credit cards. It ’ s a hot field and the perfect mix of data engineering and backend engineering.

 The Opportunity 

 In this role, you will not only develop robust backend systems but also architect and maintain scalable data pipelines and storage solutions that support complex data collection, processing, and analysis. Your dual expertise in backend and data engineering will play a crucial role in optimizing our financial technology solutions and driving informed business decisions through reliable data insights. 

 In This Role, You’ll Get to 

 Think and own the full life cycle of our products, not just a single piece of code – from business requirements, technology selection, coding standards, agile development, unit and application testing, to CI/CD and proper monitoring 
 Design, develop and maintain platforms and data pipelines across fintech 
 Boost System Performance: build systems that are stable, scalable, and highly performant to meet the dynamic demands of the financial landscape 
 Write great code and help others write great code – mentor people in your team and wider 
 Collaborate with other teams and departments 
 Exceptional problem-solving skills coupled with a strategic mindset are essential. You possess the ability to adapt to new changes and the foresight to anticipate future needs. Leadership at Agoda isn’t just managing tasks but inspiring innovation and driving vision into reality. 
 Foster Cross-Functional Collaboration: work with diverse teams to drive forward product and technology goals 
 Shape our future team: Play a pivotal role in recruiting and onboarding exceptional talent 

What You’ll Need To Succeed

 10+ years of experience with strong proficiency in Java, Kotlin, Scala, or C# with a proven track record of developing high-performance applications in production settings. Insightful experience with big data technologies like Hadoop, real-time processing frameworks (e.g., Apache Spark), and advanced knowledge of SQL and data architecture. 
 Thinks in systems: their edge cases, failure modes, and life cycles 
 Uses a metrics driven approach and can make informed decisions using data 
 You are passionate about the craft of software development and constantly work to improve your knowledge and skills 
 Experience with Scrum/Agile development methodologies 
 Excellent verbal and written English communication skills 
 Experience with operational excellence and a deep understanding of metrics, alarms and dashboards 

 It’s Great If You Have 

 Experience working in a modern FinTech or Payments organization 
 Domain knowledge in any of these areas: financial reconciliation, financial reporting, tax, payout methods like virtual credit cards or customer payments 
 Hands-on experience working with technologies like Spark for data processing, ETLs for data pipelines and queueing systems (Kafka, RabbitMQ). 
 Core engineering infrastructure tools like GitLab for source control and Continuous Integration, Kubernetes 
 Experience developing, maintaining and debugging large-scale distributed systems 
 Experience in leading projects, initiatives and/or teams, with full ownership of the systems involved

Job Description

The Design Lead manages all aspects of the design process, from research and ideation to creative conceptualization and design. He/She collaborates with stakeholders to research and develop cohesive design plans, create concepts, and oversee the development of prototypes.

As a team lead reporting to the Design Manager, he/she initiates design and research activities to be performed to enhance the core competence of his team members. He/She also works with a diverse group of internal and external stakeholders to ensure final design output meet the needs of the organization or customers.

He/She possesses good collaboration skills, partnering with internal and external stakeholders to develop creative design solutions that meet business objectives and goals, manages all aspects of the design process, from research, and ideation to creative conceptualization and design. The ability to delegate and lead design project teams towards successful adoption of new design ideas is essential for the Design Lead. He/She possesses a strong mastery of design fundamentals in their own field of specialization and can generate creative work that meets the requirements of stakeholders.

He/She is able to work on a small number of projects concurrently and deliver on expectations within deadlines with high level of changes and iterations required. In addition, he/she is up-to-date with the latest developments in the design and technology sectors, and is highly proficient in negotiation and problem-solving for the future.

Possess maturity in thinking big picture and combined with a deep sense of accountability, adaptability, and embracing ambiguity working in a fast-paced environment.
Fluency in English communications (both verbal and written).

Preferred qualifications:

Job Details:
Welcome and thank you for your interest!

We are currently looking for people to participate in our Saturn project.

What is the project about?

The purpose of this project is to collect corporate emails which you received from businesses or organizations to help improve anti-spam and email filtering technology. A corporate email usually includes the business name or brand of a company or business, e.g. example@transperfect.com, example@yatra.com, etc.

The emails should not be older than the 1st of January 2021 and should be only in English.

Task description:
You will share the emails in .eml or .msg formats from your personal computer (desktop or laptop), using our DataForce proprietary platform. You may submit a total of 50 emails.

There are 2 types of emails needed for this project, time-sensitive emails and transactional emails.

Time-sensitive emails are emails sent to an individual recipient where delivery at a specific point in time directly influences the value of the message. These are usually emails that users prefer to see in their inbox so they can act within a certain time window. For example, a meeting invitation from a company, a power outage in your house on a specific day sent by your network provider or a sudden change in flight terminal on a coming trip sent by the airline.

Transactional emails are emails sent to one individual at a time. They specify recent transactions, financial statements, shipment deliveries, receipts of purchases and travel bookings.

Regardless of the email category, each email must have the following attributes:

- Subject line should consist of a minimum of 4 words
- Sender email address should have a corporate domain name. Emails from @gmail, @yahoo, @aol, @outlook, @icloud, and other similar domains will not be accepted
- Sender Name
- Header (Subject, From, To and Date)

Who is eligible?
To participate you should meet the following qualifying criteria:
- Be 18 years or older.
- Be a resident of Indonesia.

Where is the project taking place?
This is a fully remote project.

How much is the compensation?
You will receive $1 USD for each accepted transactional email and $2.5 USD per each accepted time-sensitive email.

As payment method, we offer the following options according to your country of Residence:

- For residents of Indonesia, we offer PayPal and Gift Card.

Please note that all submissions will be checked by our Quality Assurance team and compensation will be provided for accepted assets.

How long does it take?
The task duration varies depending on how many emails you deliver and the speed of your internet connection.
Skill: Data Entry, Email, Information Technology, and Spam Filtering

Job Titles: Search Evaluation Quality Assurance - Trust and Safety - Indonesia
Job Details:
Responsibilities

 TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

Team Introduction
Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.

It is possible that this role will be exposed to harmful content as part of the core role/as part of project/ in response to escalation requests/by chance.
This may occur in the form of images, video, and text related to every-day life, but it can also include (but is not limited to) bullying; hate speech; child safety; depictions of harm to self and others, and harm to animals.

What will I be doing?
- Quality inspection of evaluated data and daily tasks of specialists.
- Localize the policies, be responsible for policy training, and align the policy updates.
- Conduct calibration meetings with the team in the appeal process: analyze different cases, record and evaluate their performance, offer solutions and suggestions for the current problem to help the team improve the accuracy rate and alignment.
- Work closely with R&D (Research and Development) and PM (Product Manager) in order to provide feedback on data quality.
- Willing to work with sensitive issues that include child exploitation, a variety of religious and political views, violence, adult & sexual content.
- Parts of this role will require supporting other products within the ByteDance suite. ByteDance is TikTok's parent company, whose mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications:
- 1 year of experience in quality assurance, data delivery process, or data evaluation.
- Possesses professional experience in companies related to AI, search engines, social media platforms, or related models.
- Fluency in English and Bahasa Indonesia is required. English will be utilized as the primary language for work, while Bahasa Indonesia will be used for market-specific communications.
- Knowledge of common data management/office software.
- Knowledge about AI or related models and familiarity with social media platforms.

Preferred Qualifications:
- The applicant has completed a Bachelor's degree.
- Those majoring in journalism, literature, mathematics, computers, medicine, law, and economics are preferred.
- Demonstrated experience in cross-functional work and collaborations with international teams is beneficial.
- Understanding of the market's culture and familiarity with the Internet usage patterns of the market's users is preferred.
 
Trust & Safety recognises that keeping our platform safe for TikTok communities is no ordinary job which can be both rewarding and psychologically demanding and emotionally taxing for some. This is why we are sharing the potential hazards, risks and implications in this unique line of work from the start, so our candidates are well informed before joining. We are committed to the wellbeing of all our employees and promise to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
Skill: Bahasa Indonesia, Communication, English, International Teams, Motors, Quality Assurance, Quality Inspection, Search Engines, Sensitive Issues, and Social Media

Job Details:

In this capacity you would be responsible for developing/utilizing tools, processes and standard work packages, and through the application and continuous practice of Lean to improve the organizations efficiency, accuracy, and customer focus.
This is a key role within this organisation as it will be part of a team of subject matter experts (SMEs) in Project Delivery and Project Management covering opportunities in the APAC region.
You will drive improved integration with Sales/Pre-Sales, and with Project Delivery, at the transition and handover points, to ensure great commercial strategies are reflected in proposals, and to ensure that winning proposals can be executed efficiently by the Project Delivery organization for an improved customer experience.
 
Job Description

Job Description

Daily execution of high-performing campaign management and execution of hygiene campaigns across multiple channels to achieve customer acquisition goals and maximize return on ad spend

Job Details:
Company Description

Who is Turner & Townsend?

All over the world people are using buildings, infrastructure, and assets we helped to deliver. It could be the hospital they work in, the railway they travel on every day, the fuel that powers their car or the data centre they depend on at work. For more than 75 years we’ve been helping to deliver transformational programmes across the real estate, infrastructure and natural resources sectors, making a difference to people’s lives and ensuring a return on investment for our clients and their investors.

Our Purpose

Transforming performance for a green, inclusive, and productive world.

The world is changing and we have a responsibility to support that change, helping drive it and be part of it. Through the commitment, capability and care our team brings, we build trust between clients, suppliers, governments and society. Delivering better outcomes that have a positive impact on the world around us. We work smarter to face the challenges of the future; bringing the clarity that helps teams realise their full potential across the real estate, infrastructure and natural resources sectors. It’s how we’ve made the difference for more than 75 years.

Our Values

Love a challenge: We love a challenge and we work hard to make change happen and see things through. We don’t stand still, challenging ourselves and others to do better every day. And we are trusted to do the right thing, raising standards all the time.

Stronger together: We’re stronger together by connecting people in diverse teams, so that we can all collaborate to deliver our best work. We focus on what matters and use our influence to build a better world for everyone.

Bring out the best in everyone: We bring out the best in everyone. We help each other to make the most of our potential, always learning from our experience. We treat each other with care and respect and make time to give everyone a voice.

Responsible for the delivery of core & shell of the project with primary focus on safety, schedule, cost, quality and compliance.
Responsible for ensuring that the project meets the Guidelines and standards which may be adjusted from time-to-time based on best practices and Lesson Learned drawn from previous projects.
Update and edit the guidelines managing the delivery of the project.
Responsible for management of the commissioning and integration activities including coordinating with various resources, vendors and contractors.
Coordinating and reviewing vendor performance relative to cash flow and summaries, together with Project Controls support.
Responsible client engagement participation in communications plans, and community involvement.

Qualifications

More than 15 years of relevant working experience as project manager - construction
Data center experience is preferred

Additional Information

Twitter

Instagram

LinkedIn

Job Titles: Senior Manager – Social Media, Marketing Strategy & Analytics (Bangkok-based, relocation provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to Know our Team:

Social Media Team of Agoda focuses on connecting and engaging millions of our followers on social channels, which includes developing strategy based on data and insights, generating trendy and relevant content, managing key influencers, leading campaign planning and execution. We are a group of collaborative and smart marketers who are both analytical and creative. The team also fosters a great learning environment, you will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

The Opportunity:

We are seeking you to lead our global social media marketing, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective social media strategies to connect with our millions of followers on social media, to make Agoda breakthrough on social media, and to generate engagement and ultimately drive conversions.

You will gain deep understanding of the Online Travel landscape and operations of a cutting-edge tech company by working closely with product, marketing, and supply teams. Because of the significant impact of these marketing activities have on our overall business, you will have regular interaction with the senior management team, including our CMO, COO, and CEO.

In this Role, you’ll get to: 

Lead, Shape and implement social media strategies for multiple channels globally, including but not limited to Tiktok, Facebook, Instagram and Twitter
Consistently ideate, create and curate content with a strong point of view and deep knowledge of Agoda’s brand, using innovative approaches to format, structure and presentation to grow our brand presence and engagement on social
Use data to inform strategy and detect new opportunities, be experimental with content and campaigns, monitor and analyze social media metrics to measure the success of campaigns and initiatives and make data-centric decisions
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in social media and leverage them to drive growth
Develop and manage influencer marketing campaigns and social media advertising campaigns

What you’ll Need to Succeed:

Prior experience (5+ years) in managing digital marketing channels or a similar role
Solid expertise in analysis and reporting, analytical thinking abilities shown to drive insights
Project management experience and fanatical attention to detail
Effective executive communication style, as demonstrated in both written and verbal formats
Entrepreneurial spirit/ability and eagerness to try different things with minimal direction

It’s Great if you have:

Strong understanding of OTA business
Strong understanding of Social Media and Content Marketing
Experienced working with SQL
