Job Details:
This company is a Series C mobile app. This is a full time role, based in South East Asia.

After nearly a decade in business they have over 45m registered users globally and 200 employees worldwide. They fall within the EdTech sector, and they cater to both businesses and enterprises in addition to their core consumer product.

They are now looking to bring in a strong Senior Product Manager who will be focused on the B2B offering, which comprises 2 products (both quite early stage). You will act as a PM for both products until they have scaled and acquired more customers, at which point you will become a Sr/Lead PM for the higher revenue product.

The company is fully remote, meaning you can work from anywhere within the APAC timezone, as long as you do not need a visa to work in the country of your choice.

Key Responsibilities

Managing your own Product from end to end, you will:

Drive product strategy and vision aligned with company goals
Develop and maintain a comprehensive product roadmap
Collaborate cross-functionally to deliver high-quality product features
Analyze data and user feedback to optimize product performance

Key Requirements:

At least 6 years' experience in product management, with successful product launches to B2B
Prior experience in start ups, or entrepreneurial ventures (even unsuccessful) is strongly preferred
Prior experience working with stakeholders including but not limited to: Sales, Marketing, Content, and external clients
Experience in edtech or B2B would be ideal
Strong communication, leadership, and analytical skills, with the ability to step up into management role within 12 months

This is a fully remote role, with a reflective salary (cap of 50k USD).

If you're interested in this role, apply now to be considered or feel free to reach out to me directly at alicia@hyphen-partners.com for more information.
Skill: Analytical Skills, Business-to-Business (B2B), Communication, Edtech, Launches, Product Launch, Product Management, Product Road Mapping, Product Strategy, and Research Skills

Job Titles: Workday Senior Integrations Specialist or Specialist (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Agoda is using a wide range of systems and tools like Workday, Zendesk, Greenhouse, etc. to support its People operations’ fast-moving pace and dynamic workforce needs globally. We are looking for a Workday Senior Integrations Specialist or Specialist to drive projects and implement solutions at scale to simplify work, automate repetitive tasks, and optimize business processes. This role will ensure service delivery excellence and timely resolution of system escalations and day-to-day issues, manage the HRIS Operations Team’s work plan and prioritization, look after regular system upgrades/enhancements, and partner with stakeholders across the department to drive continuous improvements that add value to the business.

In This Role, You’ll Get To

Drive People Technology projects and identify tech innovations and continuous improvements to meet business needs, simplify work and improve employee experience
Build simple to complex reports, integrations or automated solutions using Workday and other tools with other platforms such as Zendesk, Greenhouse, Oracle and others
Support, enhance and/or optimize existing automated solutions and processes by solving technical issues
Partner closely with key business stakeholders to assess and address overall technology needs and align on priorities, timelines, issue resolution, testing and deployment plans
Explore out-of the-box solutions to solve complex business problems and address system limitations
Implement and test major system enhancements 
Collaborate with our solutions team to design and implement custom applications
Skill up / coach more junior members of the team
Lead system-related trainings for Agoda employees and end-users across the People Team

What You’ll Need To Succeed

At least 3 years of solid HRIS integrations experience (Workday experience required)
Has strong experience with Workday Integrations and Reporting tools: PECI, Core Connectors, EIB, Studio, API, BIRT
Has strong knowledge in Workday Core HCM and other key areas (Business Processes, Security and other system configuration)
Extensive experience in implementing and supporting PECI
Has strong experience in systems implementation and/or systems integrations 
Has strong project management skills
Ability to manage stakeholder expectations
Ability to understand and explain key HRIS issues and address stakeholder requirements
Ability to leverage data to plan next steps
Familiar with agile methodology
Has good analytical and problem-solving skills
Fluency in English required

It’s Great If You Have

Experience in automation tools and programming languages outside of Workday space (MS Power Apps, SQL, HTML)
Presentation/Workshop facilitation
Possesses a global perspective and experience working with diverse cultures
Resilient, self-motivated, results-oriented and has a great sense of ownership
Collaborative and resourceful
Able to move fast, adapt to changes

 #2 #3 #IT #Bangkok #taipei #kualalumpur #jakarta #hongkong #hcmc #hanoi #manila 

Equal Opportunity Employer 

At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.

We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .

To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Job Titles: TikTok Local Services - Travel Industry Manager
Job Details:
Responsibilities

 About Us
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 

Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 

To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 

At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 

Join us.

About the Team
With the mission of "Inspiring New Life and Helping Good Business", Local Service is committed to becoming the most trusted local service platform for users and partners.
In Local Service, through POI, Video, LIVE, Search, and other various products, services and roles related to life are creatively connected, making the daily life experience richer, more unique and more innovative. 
At the same time, Local Service creates an inclusive and fair healthy business environment, helping merchants, service providers, creators and other roles to continuously create revenue and improve efficiency. 

Based in Singapore, we are on the lookout for Industry Managers who can drive growth and enrich our ecosystem. TikTok's local service partnerships are a critical means of accelerating the platform's service offerings to users and merchants. As an Industry Manager, you are expected to provide deep product insights and ongoing consultative support to TikTok's product and local service teams. The immediate focus will be on top local service partners in travel, food, and leisure to further accelerate service offerings on TikTok.

Responsibilities:
- Act as a Strategic Partner Manager to new verticals/initiatives to scale business growth and service
- Identify opportunities, develop and implement initiatives to local service partnership offerings on TikTok
- Work cross-functionally within new verticals, and other organizations to drive revenue and increase partnership and deeper collaboration
- Drive product and partner adoption and provide ongoing education about new and existing Tiktok products, focusing on those that leverage APIs and other advanced technology.
- Develop scaled approaches and processes to in-market activity and communication.
- Represent TikTok in external meetings with C-level executives while displaying the highest personal integrity and ethics. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications
- 5 years in client/ operations-facing roles, specifically in partner management
- Proven track record of successful cross-functional collaboration with peers and managers, both within the organization and with external partners.
- Demonstrated ability in presenting to diverse audiences, including internal teams and external stakeholders, across various levels of seniority.
- Strong experience in defining, developing, and leading significant projects.
- Proficient in negotiation and possess solid quantitative/analytical skills.

Preferred Qualifications 
- Preferred experience in the user technology industry.
- Preferred experience working as part of a global or international team.
- Robust product acumen, with the ability to understand and contribute to product strategy.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
Skill: Business Travel, C-Level, Communication, Negotiation, Partner Relationship Management, Presentations, Product Strategy, Travel Management, Travel Planning, and Vendor Relations

 TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

We are looking for passionate and talented people to join the TikTok LIVE Operations team and support in our mission to inspire creativity and bring joy.

Team Introduction
The LIVE Operations team is obsessed with everything to do with TikTok LIVE. From content strategy, monetization, gifting, LIVE features, data analysis, creating campaigns and ensuring a fun and safe space for all of our LIVE users.
We are looking for passionate and talented people to join the LIVE Operations team and support in our mission to inspire creativity and bring joy.

Responsibilities:
- Establish analytical framework for the TikTok Live streaming team: root cause analysis, core metrics monitoring, and automated dashboards to surface key data insights to stakeholders and inform operational strategies.
- Fully understand all the operation strategies, build sufficient indicators to measure the efficiency of current operational strategies.
- Work very closely to TikTok Live frontline operational team, highly involved in the leadership discussion routinely. Supporting key decision makings of regional operational team and strategy team with sufficient analysis.
- Follow up the data insight and lead the special project, working with cross functional team including: operational team, product team and strategy team to come up with sufficient operational leverages help business continuously growing.
- Evaluate, forecast and quantify the impact of external and internal factors on creators, agencies, operation and the TikTok ecosystem. Think from high level to look for potential growth points and risk points for the business.
- Dive deep into the data to understand how creator, viewer behaviours change with the evolution of our operational strategies. Understand top performers and use data to explore and analyse actionable operational strategies. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications (MQ's):
- Bachelor degree or above, major in mathematics, statistics, computer science is preferred; or major in science or engineering or engaged in data statistics, analysis, modelling related working areas after graduation.
- 5 years of domain experience in a supply-demand relationship internet business, or in a high-velocity, high-growth product or team.
 - Data analysis ability, familiar with Hive SQL, Python, R. Familiarity of machine learning Knowledge will be a plus.
- Familiar with statistics and dashboard, preferred to have experience in user growth, metrics creation, A/B testing, and data modelling.
 
 Preferred Qualifications (PQ's):
- An impact-oriented, customer-centric approach to data analysis; Exceptional analysis, communication, and strategy report writing skills.
- Has a “can-do” attitude with a strong sense of ownership to execute end-to-end projects. Self-driven and able to manage and balance ongoing requests with proper prioritization.

In this role, you will be developing a category and the corresponding sub-categories by building a robust team, and conducting prioritization of sub categories, leads identification, leads generation, acquisition, incubation, and performance improvement & management.

Roles & Responsibilities:
- Map category and sub-categories landscape, and define priority on which segment to be developed in collaboration with merchant and merchandise strategy team
- Define a go-to market strategy for a category/sub-category
- Plan, execute and maintain category performance (from acquisition to incubation and development) 
- Build a robust team, and manage collaborative and goal-oriented team culture
- Work with Key Account service team and external service vendors to develop key accounts, and work with Seller Development and Growth team to build clear roadmap to manage long-tail sellers
- Come up with initiatives to continuously improve competitiveness advantage 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications:
- Minimum Bachelor's degree or above
- Minimum 5 years experience in relevant categories, with strong networking to brands and big merchants; social media savvy
- Good interpersonal skills, strong logical thinking, and analytical skills 
- Well connected to big players within the industry
- English proficiency is a must

Preferred Qualifications:
- Collaborative and open to changes and challenges
- Good people manager and team player
- Good understanding on how the category needs to be developed, and do mass acquisition and incubation for long tail sellers

Job Details:
Company Description

Get to know our Team:

We’re a high performing team of passionate, fun-loving and hardworking individuals with varied backgrounds who come together to support a common mission: enable Grab to deliver faster, better, and more efficiently with each and every rollout of Products.

Our team members are spread across various countries managing multiple initiatives to deliver features that touch the everyday lives of millions of customers across south east asia through Grab.

As Technical Program & Account manager in the Grab Tech Governance team, you will be working with dynamic engineering teams and support functions including risk, compliance, legal, finance etc who are on a mission to build Processes, Services and Tools. This role will also manage regional engagements with Grab business partners.

Job Description

Get to know the Role:

8 to 15 years of experience in a Technical Program Management (TPM) or a similar leadership position within the tech industry.
Experience working with a team focused on building infrastructure, platforms, products, solutions, and technologies for various Grab Partner teams. These products directly impact millions of passengers, drivers, and merchants daily.
Ability to create and maintain delivery work orders(with Partners) for roadmaps in collaboration with respective tech teams and support functions, and lead all aspects of program delivery.
Skills to define program implementation strategies, continuously streamline the process, and make data-driven decisions on work products.
Adherence to Grab’s culture and principles, fostering an environment embodying Grab's values.
Excelling as the main point of contact, nurturing long-term relationships with Grab Partners, and serving as a trusted advisor to Grab leadership and Partners.

The Day-to-day Activities

General project and program management - define and drive project timelines, milestones, track & report progress, resolve impediments.
Quarterly planning and prioritization with Grab Partners.
Ensuring Grab tech teams are delivering product offerings needed by partners as signed in work orders.
Continuously find ways to improve the process between Grab & its partners on Product & program delivery
Facilitate whiteboard sessions to troubleshoot project contracts & implementation details considering legal, risk and compliance areas and remove blockers for the team.

Qualifications

The must haves:

Proven experience in Technical Program Management, Business Program, or Account Management.
Solid technical knowledge coupled with a proven track record in delivering solutions based on customer/partner needs.
Strong communication, presentation, and persuasive skills across all organization levels, including executives and C-level.
Capability to handle multiple projects concurrently while ensuring meticulous attention to detail.
Exceptional listening, negotiation, and presentation skills, along with excellent verbal and written communication abilities.
Skills to monitor and analyze service offerings/usage by Grab partners.
Demonstrated experience working with financial institutions or B2B businesses and a deep technical comprehension of the products or solutions being developed. 
Experience in risk management and compliance. Familiarity with the region’s financial, data and IP laws and regulations. 
A commitment to streamlining inefficient processes.
Deep understanding on handling contractual agreements and holding parties accountable.
Experience working in a dynamic, fast-moving environment where autonomy and self-decision making is needed (to an extent) and able to juggle between different projects/tasks.
Experience advising on technical solutions whenever needed is advantageous but not essential.
Skill: Account Management, Attention to Detail, Communication, Handle Multiple Projects, Negotiation, Presentation Skills, Presentations, Program Management, and Written Communication

Job Titles: Associate Manager – Social Media, Marketing Strategy & Analytics (Bangkok-based, relocation provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to Know our Team:

Social Media Team of Agoda focuses on connecting and engaging millions of our followers on social channels, which includes developing strategy based on data and insights, generating trendy and relevant content, managing key influencers, leading campaign planning and execution. We are a group of collaborative and smart marketers who are both analytical and creative. The team also fosters a great learning environment, you will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

The Opportunity:

We are seeking you to lead our global social media marketing, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective social media strategies to connect with our millions of followers on social media, to make Agoda breakthrough on social media, and to generate engagement and ultimately drive conversions.

You will gain deep understanding of the Online Travel landscape and operations of a cutting-edge tech company by working closely with product, marketing, and supply teams. Because of the significant impact of these marketing activities have on our overall business, you will have regular interaction with the senior management team, including our CMO, COO, and CEO.

In this Role, you’ll get to: 

Lead, Shape and implement social media strategies for multiple channels globally, including but not limited to Tiktok, Facebook, Instagram and Twitter
Consistently ideate, create and curate content with a strong point of view and deep knowledge of Agoda’s brand, using innovative approaches to format, structure and presentation to grow our brand presence and engagement on social
Use data to inform strategy and detect new opportunities, be experimental with content and campaigns, monitor and analyze social media metrics to measure the success of campaigns and initiatives and make data-centric decisions
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in social media and leverage them to drive growth
Develop and manage influencer marketing campaigns and social media advertising campaigns

What you’ll Need to Succeed:

Prior experience (5+ years) in managing digital marketing channels or a similar role
Solid expertise in analysis and reporting, analytical thinking abilities shown to drive insights
Project management experience and fanatical attention to detail
Effective executive communication style, as demonstrated in both written and verbal formats
Entrepreneurial spirit/ability and eagerness to try different things with minimal direction

It’s Great if you have:

Strong understanding of OTA business
Strong understanding of Social Media and Content Marketing
Experience working with SQL

Job Details:
We are looking for a dynamic and results-driven Business Development Manager to join our Serpong office. You will be a key player in driving our growth in eCommerce Enablement business unit focusing on identifying new opportunities, forging strategic partnerships, and driving exponential revenue growth.

Digital Distribusi Indonesia (DDI) was founded by an experienced offline distributor and e-commerce executive to meet the needs of online distribution, covering online sales strategy, store operations, in-app marketing, customer services, warehousing and fulfillment. In 2023, DDI was acquired by technology company AnyMind Group, and now also helps brands maximize AnyMind's powerful end-to-end commerce and marketing technology stack.

What You'll Do

Deal Sourcing and Execution: Continuously source new business opportunities and ensure successful deal closures.
Project Management: Oversee project timelines and action plans to ensure clients are onboarded according to the expected schedule.
Proposal Development: Evaluate, write, and present compelling proposals to potential clients.
Client Needs Analysis: Perform thorough needs analysis of existing and potential clients to effectively meet their requirements.
Relationship Management: Establish, develop, and maintain positive business and customer relationships.
Stakeholder Engagement: Support and interact with different stakeholders to ensure alignment and successful collaboration.
Data Collection: Collect data from external sources to identify potential clients and new business opportunities.


Who You Are

2+ years of business development/sales experience working in eCommerce.
1 year of team management experience.
Excellent English communication skills.
Strong sales skills, with a proven track record of successfully achieving revenue targets in the commercial side of E-Commerce Distribution and Enablement.
Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities to identify client challenges, propose innovative solutions, and drive business growth.
Strong negotiation and influencing skills to navigate complex client relationships and achieve mutually beneficial outcomes.
Solid knowledge of industry trends, market dynamics, and a keen understanding of the competitive landscape.
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills with strong capability to build long-term relationships with significant business clients.


Why You’ll Love It

Competitive Salary
Performance Review (2 times per year)
Performance Bonus (1 time per year)
12 days of annual paid leaves
Exciting opportunity to explore e-commerce and digital marketing trends 
Grow your career in an international, professional, fast-paced and dynamic environment
Skill: Business Development, Client Analysis, Competitive Landscape, Identifying New Opportunities, Needs Analysis, New Business Opportunities, Sales Processes, Stakeholder Engagement, Strategic Partnerships, and Strategic Thinking

Job Details:
About VIDA
VIDA is an electronic Certificate Authority (CA) company licensed and certified by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics (Kominfo). We are committed to providing secured and legally binding digital signatures to individuals and organizations. Our solutions leverage national identity verification (Dukcapil) to establish a robust foundation for digital trust in Indonesia.

About the Product
Sign is our flagship product, designed to empower businesses with a secure and efficient electronic signature solution. This product streamlines document signing processes, facilitates identity authentication, and optimizes workflows, fostering greater trust and productivity.

About the Role
We're searching for a passionate and outcome-driven Product Manager (PM) to join our growing VIDA Sign team. In this role, you'll be responsible for leading the VIDA Sign product, collaborating closely with a solid team to bring this product to market.
https://vida.id/vidasign

Responsibilities:
Partner with engineering, design, and product marketing teams to define product requirements and user stories.
Prioritize features and functionalities based on user needs, market trends, and business objectives.
Manage the product roadmap, release calendar, ensuring smooth delivery timelines are met for key milestones.
Collaborate with stakeholders across departments to define success metrics and track product performance.
Develop and maintain comprehensive product documentation, including user stories, product specifications, test cases and release notes.
Prepare for product handover to operations and marketing teams, ensuring a seamless transition including the GTM strategy.
Drive user research and analyze data to identify opportunities for product improvement.
Proactively identify and mitigate potential risks throughout the product development lifecycle.

Essential Qualifications:
3-5 years of experience in B2B product management. 
Strong understanding of the digital landscape and user needs of Indonesia and Southeast Asia.
Experience working in a fast-paced, startup environment with a focus on agility and collaboration.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to effectively manage stakeholders.
Proven ability to prioritize tasks, manage time effectively, and over communicate potential issues.
Obsessed with problem-solving approaches before jumping into the solutioning.
Familiarity with product management methodologies (eg: Agile, Scrum) is a plus.
Passion for innovation and a desire to contribute to a growing company in the digital identity space.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experienced with electronic signature solutions or digital identity verification processes.
Experience with CRM and SalesForce partnership integrations such as AWS-Microsoft sign integration.
Experience working with Indonesian government regulations and compliance requirements.
Proficiency in user research methods (eg: user interviews, usability testing).
Strong understanding of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) principles.
Skill: Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Salesforce.com

Encourage guests or followers to reserve or purchase packages. Explain details and requirements related to the property for all social media inquiries. Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. The Luxury Collection Hotels & Resorts, with over 120 properties in more than 35 countries, offers the promise of authentic experiences that evoke lasting, treasured memories. From legendary palaces and remote retreats to timeless modern classics, each luxury hotel and resort is a unique and cherished expression of its locale – a portal to the destination’s cultural charms and treasures. Job Details:
We are looking for a Bahasa Indonesian Speaking Game Presenter with the opportunity to relocate to Romania, a beautiful country in Europe!

Who Will You Work For?
Join a dynamic and leading content provider in the iGaming industry, headquartered in Bucharest, Romania. Our client offers a multi-product portfolio, including Slots, Bingo, and Live Casino, serving a global audience. As they expand their operations, they are building a new team and seeking enthusiastic online dealers to represent their brand. You will have the chance to be the face of various online casino games like Blackjack and Baccarat, bringing a real casino experience to the online world.

Why This Role?
If you enjoy engaging with people, thrive in front of the camera, and want to embark on an exciting international career, this is the perfect opportunity for you. Not only will you be part of a vibrant and innovative team, but you’ll also gain valuable experience in the fast-growing iGaming sector.

Your Key Responsibilities:
Be the Company’s Ambassador: Deliver expert knowledge and top-tier gaming experiences to our players.
Showcase Your Presentation Skills: Present all games with professionalism, ensuring a high level of engagement and entertainment in line with the Company’s expectations.
Engage and Interact: Connect with players, drawing them into the immersive world of live dealer games.
Maintain Excellence: Uphold a strong technical understanding of all games and consistently align with the Company’s brand guidelines.
Adhere to Standards: Ensure all gaming operations comply with current legislation and Company standards, prioritizing efficiency, security, and customer satisfaction.
Contribute to Growth: Actively participate in the Company’s continuous improvement efforts, contributing to its future success and expansion.

Who Are We Looking For?
Language Proficiency: Fluent in both English and Bahasa Indonesian (essential).
Relocation Enthusiast: Ready and willing to relocate to Bucharest, Romania.
Passionate About iGaming: Genuine interest in the iGaming industry with a keen desire to learn and grow.
Energetic Performer: Capable of maintaining high energy levels, especially during games that require lively interaction.
Flexible and Adaptable: Willingness to work in shifts, including nights, weekends, and public holidays, in a dynamic environment.

What’s In It For You?
Competitive Salary: Attractive monthly salary with regular increases.
Performance Bonuses: Rewards for exceptional performance.
Comprehensive Relocation Package: Includes visa assistance, flight tickets, and relocation support.
Accommodation: Company-provided accommodation with utilities covered.
Health Benefits: Best-in-class private health care insurance for your well-being.
Free Meals: Provided daily when you’re working.
Gym Benefit: Access to a gym after your first 6 months.
Professional Development: Paid training to enhance your skills and career growth.
Indonesian Community: Join a growing number of Indonesian colleagues who have already made the move and found a welcoming community within the company. You’ll have the support of fellow Indonesians, making your transition to life in Romania smoother and more enjoyable.
Career Growth: Excellent career growth opportunities within an international tech company, allowing you to expand your horizons and build a successful career.

Why Romania?
Bucharest is a vibrant city known for its rich history, cultural diversity, and welcoming community. This opportunity offers not just a job, but a new chapter in your life, with the chance to experience a new culture and develop your career in the exciting world of iGaming.

Ready to Take the Next Step?
Apply now and become a part of a fast-growing, innovative company that values your skills and offers you the platform to shine on an international stage!
Skill: Continuous Improvement, Customer Retention, Customer Satisfaction, Customer Satisfaction (CSAT), Customer Service, English, Online Casino, Presenter, Public Speaking, and iGaming

Job Titles: Marketing Communication Manager - Gran Melia Jakarta
Job Details:
We are looking for Marketing Communication Manager - Gran Melia Jakarta (Indonesia)

Mission:
We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Marketing Communication Manager to join our Sales and Marketing team. The Marketing Communication Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing strategic marketing communication plans to promote the Gran Melia Jakarta brand, enhance its visibility, and drive revenue growth.

Main responsibilities:
Develop comprehensive marketing communication strategies aligned with the hotel's overall objectives, including promoting various F&B dining outlets.
Oversee various marketing channels, including social media, website, email campaigns, advertising materials, and press releases, to strengthen and improve hotel awareness.
Be a strategic thinker with analytical skills and a data-driven approach to decision-making.
Possess a creative mindset with a passion for innovation and staying ahead of industry trends.
Cultivate relationships with media partners, influencers, and industry contacts to secure press coverage and media opportunities.
Monitor and analyze the performance of marketing communication initiatives, using data insights to optimize strategies and improve ROI.
Oversee the production of marketing collateral, ensuring high quality and adherence to brand guidelines.
Have the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines under pressure.
Initiate and arrange media or influencer events, including media previews and press conferences, to promote the hotel and its various F&B dining outlets.
Lead and mentor the marketing communication team, providing guidance, feedback, and professional development opportunities. 

Main requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or a related field. Master's degree preferred.
Proven experience (minimum 5 years) in marketing communication roles within the hospitality industry, preferably in luxury hotels or resorts.
Understanding of digital marketing principles, including social media management, content creation, SEO, and email marketing.
Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills, with the ability to craft compelling content tailored to different audiences and platforms.
Demonstrated success in developing and executing integrated marketing communication campaigns that drive brand awareness and revenue growth.
Strategic thinker with analytical skills and a data-driven approach to decision-making.
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and external partners.
Creative mindset with a passion for innovation and staying ahead of industry trends.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines under pressure

About The Team
The Global E-commerce Integrity is responsible for the integrity supervision, correction, accountability, and compliance training and communication within the Company's Global E-commerce business. By identifying and analyzing risky business scenarios, the Global E-Commerce Integrity aims to help business units detect and solve issues in a timely manner. Additionally, according to needs by the business units, it accepts internal and external whistleblowing reports, verify them independently and fairly and, independently or in coordination with other functions, solve them. The Global E-Commerce Integrity also provides, according to requirements by the Company policies, applicable laws and regulations and needs by the business units, compliance training and communication to employees of the Global E-Commerce and thereby helps enhance its integrity and compliance and communicate the Company’s emphasis and requirements on a culture of integrity and compliance, establish and maintain a sustainable environment of compliance within the Company and reduce or avoid corrupt, unethical or other conducts that are in violation of laws and regulations.

Roles & Responsibilities:
- Through multiple channels of reporting and data analysis, investigate cases of integrity, fraud or conflict of interest among e-commerce employees.
- Manage the operational delivery of services including due diligence products, intelligence analysis, and complex investigations.
- Take responsibility for ensuring the quality, accuracy and consistency of all intelligence, and investigation and due diligence products.
- Provide analytical guidance and insight across all products with an all-source approach.
- Consistently look to develop, enhance, innovate operational efficiency, and effectiveness.
- Work closely across multiple functions and departments to protect and enhance business operations. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications:
- Bachelor degree or above, 3 years or more of relevant work experience in corporate risk control/big four consulting, forensics, risk management/governance/due diligence, etc.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Upright, self-motivated and principled, rigorous and steady, with strong communication, coordination and promotion capabilities.
- Capable of resilience and logical thinking in a challenging work environment.
- Have good logical analysis and business understanding skills, good insight, and be good at summarizing.

Job Titles: Moderation Quality Assurance Analyst, TikTok E-Commerce (Jakarta)
Job Details:
Responsibilities

 About TikTok
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. 
 
Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.
 
About 
The e-commerce industry has seen tremendous growth in recent years and has become a hotly contested space amongst leading Internet companies, and its future growth cannot be underestimated. With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand new and better e-commerce experience to our users. We aim to bring discovery, inspiration, and joy back to shopping by making TikTok the commerce channel of choice for merchants, creators, and affiliates.With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand new and better e-commerce experience to our users. We are looking for passionate and talented people to join our product and operations team, to build an e-commerce ecosystem that is innovative, secure and intuitive for our users and brands.

Responsibilities
- Utilize quality management tools to strategically enhance policies through providing policy implementation feedback and minimizing moderation policy inefficiencies.
- Deep understanding of Listing/Content/ Intellectual Property Rights moderation guidelines and moderation strategies from the policy team, and work as an expert for the specific domains.
- Collaborate with stakeholders (i.e. policy teams) and develop quality inspection standards, to continuously optimize & refine policies, processes and platforms.
- Collaborate & lead BPO Quality Assurance to ensure a high quality standard of moderation delivery; conduct risk inspections based on identified risks, reducing risk exposure on the platform
- Work closely with QA market leaders, local partner operations, training & SOP teams to enhance moderation policies through identifying quality & product risks.
- Validate and implement rejection labels, granting whitelist or revoking penalties stemming from erroneous human/machine moderation.
- Initiate, lead & guide small/medium scale projects, pilot implementation of new platforms and tool functionalities aimed at enhancing moderation efficiency & quality.
- Participate in large scale projects, aimed at identifying shortcomings or opportunities, provide business requirements (BRDs) from a moderation quality viewpoint. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications
- Bachelor's degree in any discipline.
- Fluency in English and Bahasa Indonesia to moderate specific product/content listings for TikTok Shop Indonesia
- Minimum 3 years of hands on and in-depth experience in e-commerce or online safety and quality analysis.
- Excellent coordination skills and communication skills across multiple cross-functional teams to build plans and projects.
- Support business in shifts by following the local labor laws.
 
Preferred Qualifications
- Bachelor's Degree in business administration, operations, or project management.
- Familiar with E-commerce compliance requirements and internet governance management, with a certain level of business sensitivity and risk awareness.
- Able to digest large data sets/policies in a cohesive and actionable manner.
- Experience in Program Management or Project Management roles.

Job Titles: Search Operations Quality Assurance, Model Data - Trust and Safety - Indonesia
Job Details:
Responsibilities

 TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

Team Introduction
Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community. 

It is possible that this role will be exposed to harmful content as part of the core role/as part of project/ in response to escalation requests/by chance.
This may occur in the form of images, video, and text related to every-day life, but it can also include (but is not limited to) bullying; hate speech; child safety; depictions of harm to self and others, and harm to animals.

Our Search Operations team supports our efforts to address objectionable or disturbing content which could include images of violence, animal cruelty, hate speech, violent extremism, or content that exploits or endangers children. The team plays a vital role in analyzing user searches and search strategy optimization to ensure a positive and safe user experience for our community.

What will I be doing?
- Quality inspection of labeled data on time and ensure the quality.
- Localize the labeling guidelines, support the guideline training, and align the guideline updates.
- Conduct calibration meetings with the labeling team in the appeal process: analyze different cases, record and evaluate their performance, and offer solutions and suggestions for the current problem to help the team improve the accuracy rate and alignment.
- Work closely with R&D (Research and Development) and PM (Product Manager) in order to provide feedback on data quality.
- Parts of this role will require supporting other products within the ByteDance suite. ByteDance is TikTok's parent company, whose mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications:
- Proficiency in English and Bahasa Indonesia (local language).
- 1 year of experience as a Content Specialist or Content Reviewer.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Have completed a Bachelor’s degree or above.
- 1 year of experience as a Quality Assurance in Content or Customer Service.
- Good knowledge of search engines, and familiarity with social media platforms.
- An in-depth understanding of local culture and familiarity with the Internet usage habits of local users.

Trust & Safety is committed to the well-being of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental well-being throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that well-being is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centered, innovative, and integrated approach.

To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
Skill: Bahasa Indonesia, Data Quality, English, Marketing, Moderating, Quality Assurance, Quality Inspection, Search Engines, Social Media, and Web Analytics

Job Details:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!





Job Description

Our team is seeking an passionate Senior Associate Product Manager to join us as we create and deliver mission critical services and processes to enable Traveloka Transport, specifically in our Supply side.

As a Senior Associate Product Manager you will take a customer first and data driven mindset to drive, decide, coordinate, and execute projects related to Flight Supply, in collaboration with multi-discipline feature teams including user experience experts in our Design team, our passionate developers and Engineers, and the rest of Product and Operations Team.

In this role, you will:

Navigate various data types, technical, design, and system map to simplify complex process and touchpoints 
Translate product strategy into product plan, detailed requirements and prototypes 
Prioritize and define product roadmaps, design documents and proposals, manage product backlog, make quick decisions and coordinate the team to release quality products within planned timelines based on business and customer impact 
Act as a product evangelist to build awareness and understanding about product, its scope and processes, impact and risk for all stakeholders, including customers
Monitor the key metrics of the products and features owned to ensure effectiveness and efficiency at all times
Work closely with mission team in conducting regular analysis and deep dive on the products and features’ performance, and improvements when necessary Identify issues and improvement opportunities that can push the products and features’ performance forward
Advocate customers for internal stakeholders to ensure high impact and functioning products and features that would help our customers do travel their way



Requirements

To be successful in this role, you must possess:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or other relevant fields (Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, IT, Chemistry, Physics, Engineering Science, STEM) from reputable universities with minimum GPA of 3.5/4.0. 
A Master's Degree in the aforementioned field is a plus. 
At least 4 years working experience. Previous experience in Product Manager track and experience in the travel industry, other technology company, or global consulting field is a preferable. 
Good understanding of product management / development, preferably in the internet space 
Excellent analytical skills and ability to interpret complex data to drive decision-making. 
Passion in data-driven product development and making the world better through technology. 
Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple initiatives simultaneously and deliver results within deadlines. 
Demonstrate ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders at all levels. 
Excellent communication skill in English, both written and verbal, with the ability to present ideas and influence stakeholders effectively. 
Excellent analytical skills and strong intuitions of user behaviors. 
Ability to quickly learn and absorb new knowledge in the fast-changing and dynamic industry, and synthesize learnings into strategic growth levers that generate tangible business impacts.



If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!
Skill: Analytical Skills, Communication, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Design Documents, English, Key Metrics, Product Management, Product Strategy, Project Management, and Timelines

Work you will do

This role sits within the SAP team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which encompasses the SAP Module solutions respectively. As a leader of this group, you will drive the growth of our SAP business in the region and be responsible for the creation, sale and delivery of SAP solutions: Functional and Technical Design, SAP Application & Systems Development, SAP Business Transformation, etc.

 Engage clients in workshops and interviews to analyze process and reporting requirements 
 Advise clients on industry/ cross-industry leading practices. Advise clients on SAP recommended processes and functions 
 Design target state SAP solutions for clients. Influence clients’ thinking in adopting leading/ standard practices while developing target state 
 Analyze application landscape to design interfaces to SAP solution 
 Perform SAP configuration and tests. Develop specifications for development of forms/ reports/ interfaces. 
 Lead the consultant and client teams through the implementation cycle including planning and execution of testing, migration and cutover. 
 Support change management execution by developing training material, delivering training and supporting users post cutover. 
 Develop relationships with internal and external stakeholders 

What We Are Looking For

If you are someone with:

 A good honors Degree, preferably at postgraduate level, in Information Technology, Business Information Systems, Business, Engineering, Mathematics or related disciplines. 
 Senior Consultant will require a minimum of 6 years of experience in SAP Logistics/Procurement related modules (Ariba), completed at least an end to end full life cycle of SAP Logistics/Procurement related modules (Ariba), implementations. Also have some team leading experiences would be a plus 
 Has experience in SAP S/4 HANA would be a plus 
 Demonstrated success in multi-cultural work environment. 
 Sound understanding of business process, industry nuances and leading practices in area of focus 
 Ability to facilitate effective workshops to lead target state design. 
 Ability to lead teams 
 Demonstrated excellence in conceiving and executing SAP solution 
 Broad understanding of SAP design. Appreciation of digital enterprise and emerging technologies 
 Sound business acumen, teamwork and leadership qualities. 
 Willingness to work outside of office base and most of all… 
 An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a pre-requisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment. 

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified. 

Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles taht you are interested via this official Deloitte website.

Job Titles: Staff Software Engineer – JVM/Rust Expert (Bangkok-based, Full Relocation Package Provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda 

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

About Agoda 

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to know our team – Observability Platform in Agoda

Within the WhiteFalcon team, we build and maintain Agoda’s time series database and log aggregation system. We process tens of millions of measurements per second and hundreds of terabytes of logs per day in multiple datacenters, powering thousands of dashboards and alerts. Our biggest challenges are to support the ever-growing need for collecting more data, faster and at lower cost.

In This Role, You’ll Get to

Build fault-tolerant, horizontally scalable solutions running in multi-tenant environments
Solve challenging problems in distributed and highly concurrent environment
Impact all developers in Agoda, providing better observability instruments

What You’ll Need To Succeed

At least 8 years of experience writing performant and scalable code using JVM (Java/Scala/Kotlin) or Rust (C++) languages
User/dev experience of one of the following products: Prometheus, InfluxDB, Victoria Metrics, Elasticsearch, Grafana Loki
Production experience with messaging queues (Kafka)
Deep understanding of concurrency and multithreading
Value code simplicity and performance
Demonstrate proficiency in communication and collaboration skill

It’s Great If You Have

Strong background in DB internals, indexes, data formats (AVRO, Protobuf)
You generally understand observability data types, such as logs and metrics
Profilers, debuggers, tracers hide no secrets from you, especially in a Linux environment
Experience building large-scale time series data stores and monitoring solutions
Experience with S3 (Ceph), Elasticsearch, Grafana and other open-source components
You can get down to the low-level when needed

Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to know our team:

Growth and Accelerator Team 

Growth and Accelerator is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda’s emerging and high-growth accommodation partners. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we roll out new products to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and services and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

 The Opportunity: 

As  Partner Executive  your key objective is growing the coverage and quality of Agoda’s supply network. Along with your team, you take care of a portfolio of high growth supply partners and assist in partnership related functions at scale.

 In this role, you’ll get to: 

 Contact high growth supply partners to highlight revenue growth opportunities and maximize value 
 Encourage program participation through focused project sprints 
 Communicate efficiently with partners through various communication methods including phone, email, messaging and webinars 
 Use data and dashboards to prioritize tasks 
 Train and inform partners on our technologies, tools and models 
 Prioritize daily tasks, monitor results and track progress in internal systems 
 Respond to partners requests in a timely and effective manner 

 What you’ll need to succeed: 

Minimum 3 years’ experience working in business development or execution role
 Demonstrates basic computer skills 
 Analytical skills desired 
 Analytical and proven track record in using data to drive achievements and make decisions 
Intellectual curiosity 
 Autonomous and result driven (history of achieving ambitious targets) 
 Ability to work under pressure in a competitive industry/rapidly changing environment 
 Strong communication and interpersonal skills, is able to have minimum of 10 meaningful conversations with partners per day 
 Ability to work in a highly dynamic environment and is open to change in responsibilities, workflows, as needed by the business 
 Able to support Indonesia market and following the business hours & public holidays in Indonesia 

#Bali #Indonesia

Job Details:
About The Role

At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do to bring cheer to the lives of millions. In this role, you will be part of Gojek’s transport engineering team, building some of the most critical products for our consumers. As a Software Engineer in Gojek, you will be responsible for building systems and products across the various areas of business for Gojek Transport. Your ownership, drive, and passion would help provide for a world-class user experience and stability of Transport products for mobility or people and packages.

The person should be passionate about maintaining a clean and maintainable codebase. Your primary focus will be the development of distributed systems and services that are fault-tolerant, highly performant and responsive to high throughput client requests.

What You Will Do

Own product development on functional and non-functional requirements, OKRs, and improvements to code quality across the team
Design and develop low latency, high throughput systems with minimal guidance
Be responsible for ensuring the quality and timeliness of deliverables for the team
Be a self-learner when it comes to technology and work with the team to collaborate on the engineering initiatives as the products go through the evolution cycle
Own the entire lifecycle of feature development, test, deployment, fixes and improvements
Work with tech leads, product managers and other stakeholders to continuously work towards progressing on the group’s and organization’s goals
Write code that is clear, concise, performant, tested and easily understood by others
Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross-functional teams in a global environment

What You Will Need

At least 2 years of experience in designing, developing, testing and deploying applications with Golang/Java/Ruby. Proficient in OOP, SQL, Design Patterns
Experience with functional programming, data modeling experience in Relational and/or NoSQL databases is a plus 
Well-versed with agile methodologies
Hands on knowledge of unit testing methodologies and frameworks
Experience troubleshooting server performance - memory issues, GC tuning, resource leaks
Experience working in technologies like Kafka, RabbitMQ, Postgres, MySql, Redis, Aerospike, or similar

About The Team

Our Transport team is a big family of 100+ members made up of engineers and product managers spread out across Jakarta, Bangalore, Singapore, and Vietnam. We run Southeast Asia’s leading and fastest-growing ride-hailing business and oversee all things related to our riders and driver-partners' needs in daily transport and work daily to create solutions to these issues. It’s our job to ensure that our Transport services run seamlessly from the inside out.

Our team recently figured out that our existing third-party SDK for in-app live tracking of vehicles was not operating as smoothly as we had expected. So, guess what? We fixed this by building our own live tracking SDK - Navic. Right now, our team has been busy working on projects that aim to effectively grow our user base in the region (and beyond!).

We, the Transporters, know how to work hard and play hard. When we aren’t busy working, you’d probably find us playing online games like Among Us and Sketchful, or catching up with each other on our virtual hangouts. We work as a team to get our job done well, and genuinely enjoy each other's company.

About GoTo Group

GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household.

About Gojek

Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.

About GoTo Financial

GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last.

GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.
Skill: Communication, Design Patterns, Go (Programming Language), Java, Non-Functional Requirements, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Pattern, Product Service, Ruby, and SQL

Job Details:
Company Description

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Job Description

Get to know the team 

The Jabo GrabFood team is dedicated to overseeing, sharing, and driving growth for the GrabFood business. We play a vital role in realizing Grab’s vision of becoming Southeast Asia’s superapp by delivering essential everyday services that resonate with consumers in Indonesia. Our focus is on developing and executing business strategies that align with our mission of serving the community. In this team, the role emphasizes omnicommerce and strategic projects, where we take ownership of growing various Omnicommerce business lines, including Dine Out Deals. Additionally, we manage growth initiatives and long-term projects for Deliveries, guiding them from conceptualization and strategy to planning and execution.

Get to know the role 

We are looking for a dynamic and experienced individual to take on the role of Growth Lead. In this position, you will play a key role in scaling and expanding Grab’s Omnicommerce business in Jakarta. Your main responsibilities will include enhancing the user funnel to increase the overall platform user base and serving as the primary point of contact for strategic projects. You will be part of a lean and agile team, working closely with various departments to drive P&L growth and meet essential performance metrics.

The Day-to-Day Activities

Business Management: Lead the expansion project for the Jabo Omnicommerce business by ensuring the successful implementation of business plans and the attainment of financial objectives. Focus on increasing the user base by enhancing the user funnel and executing other strategic initiatives.
Conduct Analyses & Developing Insights: Evaluate business performance, user behavior, and the competitive landscape to produce actionable insights that inform business strategies. Spot market opportunities, trends, and customer insights to enhance user growth and revenue.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with teams from Sales and Business Development, Marketing, Merchant Operations, Product, and other departments to ensure alignment and execution of business goals.
Stakeholder Management: Foster and maintain robust relationships with both internal and external stakeholders, ensuring transparent communication and alignment on objectives and deliverables.

Qualifications

The Must-Haves 

A minimum of 3 years of working experience in related fields (strategy, consulting, retail, e-commerce) 
Comfort with data and numbers, backed by robust analytical skills. Proficient with Excel, SQL, Python skill would be a strong bonus.
The candidate should demonstrate a strong and independent willingness to learn, have the ability to quickly understand new concepts, and exhibit an innate curiosity
Excellent problem-solving skills, possesses the ability to take complex problems and break them down into actionable solutions, backed by data insights 
High adaptability to changes, with the ability to pivot quickly from long-term strategic thinking to immediate tactical action.
The ability to thrive under pressure and uncertainty. 
Bachelor's degree, complemented by a strong academic track record.
Skill: Business Planning, Communication, E-Commerce, Easily Adaptable, New Concepts, Performance Metrics, Problem Solving, Stakeholder Management, Strategic Initiatives, and Strategic Thinking

Job Details:
About This Role 
You will be responsible for identifying, prioritizing ,and closing new clients to meet company’s revenue and gross profit objectives. You will interact with marketing managers and executives from the top mobile advertisers to help achieve their marketing goals with the Mobvista products, leading the sales effort across the entire funnel to close new business. Your responsibilities will include researching and generating new opportunities, establishing deal terms, and selling mobile advertising solutions via a consultative approach.

Responsibilities
Take responsibility for growing Nativex’s Performance business from performance advertisers from Indonesia.
Collaborate with direct clients, agencies. Manage key relationships across agency partners and direct clients.
Work towards attainable quarterly sales targets and meet/ exceed these goals. 
Work closely with regional leadership to implement overall sales plan.
Work in partnership with dedicated customer success managers to successfully deliver.

Qualifications
Education: Bachelor’s degree or above.
Language: Ability to speak and write in English Fluently.
Experience: at least 2-3 years’ experience in performance digital marketing, with a network of good relationships with digital first clients from Indonesia.

Comfortable working with several different teams inside the organization to collaborate and grow the account.

Job Details:
Build your Career with Mitrais!
Mitrais has engaged a large Australian software company on an exciting software development project. We're looking for Senior Golang Developer to be part of the team.

What will you be doing?
Coding high-quality software using distributed computing, messaging, microservices, performance tuning and memory and resource management techniques
Developing data-driven solutions for a range of clients.
Collaborating within cross-functional and international agile teams.

A CAREER, not a JOB!

 To Apply…

Job Details:
Responsibilities

 About Us
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

About the Team
In this role you will drive consumer traffic into our platform with an aim to convert them via the planning and executing the different levels of our annual campaign calendar for the marketplace, specific categories or brands.

Roles & Responsibilities:
- Campaign Planning: Develop and implement comprehensive category-specific campaign strategies to drive sales, engagement, and customer acquisition.
- Collaborate with internal teams to align campaign objectives with overall business goals and marketing initiatives.
- Conduct thorough market research to identify trends, opportunities, and competitive landscape for each category.
- Own and manage the budget allocation for category campaigns, ensuring optimal utilization of resources and cost-effectiveness.
- Cross-functional Collaboration: Work closely with product, account managers, and creator teams to ensure cohesive and compelling campaign messaging and visuals.
- Execution and Optimization: Oversee the end-to-end execution of category campaigns, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with campaign objectives.
-Responsible for managing people and encouraging continuous learning and growth by providing development opportunities and fostering a culture of development within the organization. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
- 5 Proven experience in e-commerce marketing, with a focus on category campaigns.
- Team management Experience


Preferred Qualifications:
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make strategic recommendations.
- Excellent project management and organizational skills.
- Demonstrated experience in budget management and optimization.
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
Skill: Budget Management, Budgeting, Campaign Strategies, Campaigns, Communication, E-Commerce, Marketing Campaign Management, Marketing Campaign Plans, Marketing Campaigns, and Optimization

Job Details:
Our customers will measure our contribution to their success based on the value they receive from our services. TAMs are responsible for the overall governance and technical service delivery. They help customers maximize the business value of their Oracle investments, achieving the desired business outcomes while minimizing risk. To do this, TAMs must become trusted advisors to the customer, ensure consistency and quality of deliverables, help customers deliver their IT strategy, overcome challenges and meet business goals, and use leading practices for successful Oracle technology and Cloud deployments and operations. The Services Portfolio includes Managed Services, On-Premise, Hybrid Cloud, Applications, Platforms and Databases (SaaS/PaaS/IaaS), and Security services that TAMs may manage in full or in part.

Responsibilities displayed in the job posting

Develop and Manage the Oracle Customer Relationships by forming long term customer relationships with key customer contacts. Work is non-routine and complex, involving the application of advanced technical/business skills in area of specialization. Provides direction and mentoring to more junior team members. Understand customer’s industry drivers, organization structure and key stakeholders, key projects and goals, and critical success factors as well as technical infrastructure and roadmap.
Work collaboratively with sales, the delivery teams and customers to identify appropriate solutions.
Coordinate delivery of Oracle Services, operating as the primary delivery contact to the customer, aiding and facilitating customer communications and activities across other Oracle lines of business.
Responsible for delivering to the contracted terms, effective and efficient use of Oracle delivery resources, achieving the contract margin and revenue objectives.
Identify and submit delivery leads for new opportunities and contract renewals.
Act as a point of contact for any major incidents, responsible for managing communication and customer expectations through resolution.
Establish and maintain a delivery governance model with the customer at the management and executive levels.
Perform scope and risk management.
Contribute to initiatives for Oracle delivery organizational process improvement and tool development.
Conduct periodic Service Account Planning and Account Reviews.
