Job Number 24140195

Job Category Sales & Marketing

Location Sheraton Surabaya Hotel & Towers, Jalan Embong Malang 25-31, Surabaya, East Java, Indonesia VIEW ON MAP

Schedule Full-Time

Located Remotely? N

Relocation? N

Position Type Management

Job Summary

The Manager of eCommerce and Digital sits at the intersection between Marriott International’s eCommerce, marketing, and global distribution strategies. This role helps a group of properties in a region (or cluster) effectively pull through the sales, marketing, and customer engagement activities that help drive awareness and profitability at the property level. This role will also manage overall activation of their property strategies in owned and third party electronic channels (Marriott.com, multi-lingual global sites, OTAs, meta search sites, search engines, and other eMarketing vehicles). This role will work on behalf of properties to increase revenue, grow market share and create a compelling experience that steers customers towards booking on our direct online channels. The Manager of eCommerce and Digital serves as a thought leader to their group of hotels, providing local, area, and country-wide insight to enhance their digital experience. To this end, he/she will be in touch with their properties on a regular basis to make sure they are fully activated and optimized on Marriott.com and appropriate in-language global sites. The role partners hand in hand with their colleagues in the cluster marketing team to engage current and would-be customers with targeted messaging that’s relevant, on-brand, and genuinely engaging. From time to time this role also provides eCommerce communication, training, education, reporting and analysis to digital and marketing teams on property.

CANDIDATE PROFILE 

Education And Experience

Required:

 2-year degree from an accredited university in eCommerce, Marketing, Business Administration or related major and 4 years experience in the sales, marketing, digital, eCommerce or related professional area; hospitality marketing or agency experience preferred

OR

 4-year bachelor's degree in eCommerce, Marketing, Business Administration or related major; 2 years experience in the sales, marketing, digital, eCommerce or related professional area; hospitality marketing or agency experience preferred. 

CORE WORK ACTIVITIES

Area Digital and eDistribution Strategy Execution

 Advises hotels on appropriate on-strategy eCommerce priorities and tactics
 Coordinates with the Area Director of Sales and Marketing and the AP Director of eCommerce and Digital Services to set ecommerce goals for their cluster/hotels

 Collaborates closely with Vice President of Brand Marketing, Directors of Field Marketing (DFMs), and cluster Marketing and Communication teams to execute online Brand Marketing strategies and plans for the cluster

Digital Acquisition Marketing

 Coordinates execution of online marketing efforts through approved agencies/vendors and Marriott Digital Services team
 Manages Search Engine Optimization (SEO) efforts for hotels by leveraging the Marriott Digital Services team (MDS) or external Agencies
 Assists hotels in optimizing Paid Search performance; engages external Agencies for supplemental Paid Search efforts if needed
 Manages the PLUS Platform for participating hotels in the area/cluster
 Executes online marketing activities in partnership with hotel and cluster Marketing leaders (e.g., loading Marriott.com Hotel Website deals, Group Deals, Group Value Dates, email marketing and affiliate marketing)
 Assures that hotel websites on Marriott.com and global sites are fully optimized to maximize traffic from search engines
 Identifies hotel-specific online digital activation needs (e.g., local channels to focus marketing efforts through)

Hotel Web Site Content Optimization

 Conducts regular audits of Marriott.com and individual Hotel Websites to ensure each hotel is optimized for high quality custom images, content, links, and accurate translations; works with hotels on corrective action where necessary
 Serves as the EPIC/Vignette administrator for the hotel(s)
 Provides consultation to hotel digital marketing teams in developing hotel website modules for Spa, Golf, Food & Beverage and weddings
 Manages the pull-through and activation of key corporate eCommerce projects (e.g., new Marriott.com Hotel Websites, new field SEO service, and similar corporate e-services)
 Uses B2B e-tools to grow online bookings for Group and Corporate business in cluster hotels
 Identifies and implements efforts to drive online awareness and bookings for hotel F&B outlets

OTAs and Meta Search Channel Optimization

 Ensures that all hotels within their region/cluster are participating in relevant, approved echannels
 Regularly audits content, images, and star ratings on OTAs and Meta Search sites, and works with hotels to make appropriate corrections
 Partners with cluster and area marketing teams to define and execute the hotel OTA merchandising plan(s)
 Identifies and executes hotel/cluster/area OTA marketing and merchandising tactics as needed (e.g. Agoda newsletter, Expedia TravelAds, etc.)
 May also co-manage soft-dollar marketing budget for domestic OTAs with the AP eDistribution Team
 Builds strong domestic relationships with the top 2-3 OTA partners
 Collaborates with hotel and regional Revenue Leaders to review hotel performance on eChannels

Marketing and Communication Partnership

 Assists in the development and execution of the cluster marketing plan (e.g. retargeting campaign, OTA marketing, etc.)
 Develops the offer landing page on Marriott.com for cluster offers
 Identifies and obtains Marriott.com and OTA marketing and merchandising placements as appropriate
 Creates mini-sites for domestic segment marketing efforts where needed (e.g. MICE or Weddings)

Opening Hotel Support

 Collaborates with Field Marketing to develop, recommend and execute the opening S&M plan for the hotel
 Sets up the Marriott.com Hotel Web Site
 Activates the hotel for sale on approved OTAs
 Shop hotel to ensure M.com and OTA rates are set up correctly
 Work with brand marketing team to position the hotel on digital channels
 Works with marketing and sales teams to plan the pre-opening budget and execute the budget according to what is best for the brand, region
 Acts as a point of contact for agencies reaching out for information about the hotel and redirect them to the right person to speak with
 Creates online press releases and helps with property SEO to drive awareness to hotel
 Helps set digital sales goals for new opens in partnership with sales and revenue management

eCommerce Communication and Training

 Uses the eCommerce Resource guide
 Trains and educates cluster and/or hotel-level managers on how to activate their hotel eCommerce and digital marketing strategy
 Delivers eCommerce training, presentations, and workshops to region, cluster and hotel-level associates and management in partnership with cluster/regional marketing teams
 Serves as cluster-level point-person for Marriott’s eCommerce strategy. 
 Builds solid relationships with ADSMs, GMs, cluster Marketing and Revenue Management teams (where relevant) to raise their awareness, understanding, and motivation to e-activate their hotels. 
 Participates in regularly-scheduled global and regional eCommerce and Marketing web conferences and calls to review performance, share best practices, and troubleshoot issues. 
 Delivers a monthly report and newsletter, and hosts a monthly webinar, for hotels
 Develops other cluster-level eCommerce communications, as appropriate
 Stay up-to-date on and communicate industry and competitive trends, with a focus on the domestic online travel landscape

Job Details:
Getting to Know Ajaib

We've been experiencing hyper-growth the past year, becoming Indonesia's 7th Unicorn Startup and the first Investment Fintech Unicorn in South East Asia 2,5 years after Ajaib first launched. With the global financial technology market expected to grow gradually, we aim to make stock trading accessible for millennials through our mobile-first approach. In 2022, we opened our new head office in the Indonesia Stock Exchange Building, and we're just getting started!

The three principles, or what we call as 3DNAs became the foundation and set the guideline for the Magician belief system: Everyone is an owner, Growth Mindset, and A Will to Win.

Life at Ajaib

Here at Ajaib, we address ourselves as Magicians because making magic happen is our specialty! Ajaib is committed to creating an inclusive environment where all Magicians are valued for their contributions, opinions, and skills. Through our 3DNAs, we implement Everyone is an Owner to strengthen our core value in developing as a team, Growth Mindset to never stop learning, and A Will to Win to have courage in being excellent in everything we do!

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Creative mindset with a passion for social media and digital marketing
Self-motivated and able to work well in a team


Benefits

Join us as we make magic happen to increase Indonesia's financial inclusion!

Are you ready to unleash your potential?

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.

Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

What You Will Do

This role is with Deloitte Digital Southeast Asia. Across all clients and sectors, we believe great customer experiences create greater impact. That elevating the human experience creates enduring value, for the organization, for the customer, for society, for all.

We are seeking an experienced Digital Marketing Manager who will consult for Financial Services (Banking & Insurance) clients in the following areas: 

Develop customer acquisition plans and marketing campaigns that encompass competitive assessment, testing strategy, creative positioning, integration into partner digital channels, and leveraging emerging media options (Programmatic Display, PPC, Video, Social, etc.) to deliver against business goals & agreed KPI/Outcomes

Lead a team to implement Campaigns to maximize segment/channel opportunities:
Leads Management & Funnel Marketing including drop-off re-marketing & win-back
 Oversee and manage the Customer Acquisition & Engagement Funnel

Runs campaigns for Online/Mobile Banking signup, activation, usage, MAU/DAU initiatives
Leverages Customer Engagement & Communication Assets
Enable client to establish a robust marketing governance framework
Work closely with client’s business units to promote cross channel pollination, optimize existing customer experience and identify profit opportunities.
Your role as a leader:

Lead and act as an exemplary role model for leaders at all levels, whilst continuously promoting a sense of loyalty and energizes others to act.
Build and sustain a high performance culture by cultivating and amplifying individual and team strengths.
Develop and sustain long-term, trust-based relationships with stakeholders, clients and team.
Manage the sustainable development of a strong pipeline of talent for current and future success, by driving a talent experience that differentiates Deloitte.
Lead behavioral and cultural change through a supportive, collaborative and highly inclusive environment where team members feels supported, respected and engaged.

If you are someone with:  

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field; advanced degree preferred.
Minimum 10 years of experience in digital marketing, with at least a few years of experience gained in Retail Banking / Insurance marketing
Good working knowledge of retail banking (wealth, loans, cards etc) and insurance (life/general)

Has experience in building repeatable campaigns (adhoc, seasonal, always-on) for FSI customers

Managed Budgets and optimizes marketing dollars with repeatable campaigns

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with clients and internal teams.
Creative thinker with a results-oriented mindset and a passion for driving innovation and delivering exceptional customer experiences.
An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a pre-requisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment.

Headquartered in Mumbai, we have our global footprints across 10 countries worldwide including United States and Germany. Job Details:
Position Summary

The Senior UI/UX Designer will be responsible for leading the design and user experience efforts for mainly enterprise digital products. This role requires the ability to translate complex technical requirements into intuitive and engaging interfaces.

Role And Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities:

[Research] Perform benchmarking, secondary research, and analysis for each design project prior to concept and design stage. Deliver sufficient research report as a base of Design direction.
[Concept] Creates User flow based on User Acceptance Criteria, and design User Experience Concept with User Interface concept, to solve problems in the project. Design solution solves problem from research / analysis, which adhere to Design fundamental principles, Law of psychology and technical standards in software development of Human Interaction.
[Design] Define visual language for the digital product, including font choice, colour pallette, icons, illustrations, and photo treatments. These might be designed from scratch, or they might be selected from available library.
[Design] Deliver beautiful UI Design of many alternatives, with consistency across screens and details of user flow.
[Prototype] Create prototype, detailed and polished screen designs that show exactly how the app or website will be like.
[Validation] Consistently perform usability testing as part of Design Validation. Compile multiple reports of test is a plus.
[Development] Manage and oversee development of UI Design with PM and Development team. Responsibility of UI specifications from asset files, color spec, measurement and implementation on different screens.
[Development] Conduct & Manage UI review of development result to maintain high design quality on the product
[Teaching] Mentoring Junior UIUX Designers and Interns.


Skills And Qualifications

Bachelor Degree in Information Technology from reputable university
Master's degree (MA or MSc) in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or a related field from an accredited university abroad is a plus.
10+ years of experience in UI/UX design, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design work.
Experienced in technology company such as Software company or Digital Service company, working as UI/UX Designer
Strong visual design skills with attention to detail.
Able to use Sketch Design software, and ability to adapt new software such as Protopie
Experienced in Design Research project (User Research / Analysis & Reporting / Usability Testing)

Job Details:
At AccelByte, our mission is to empower game creators by providing them with the backend platform and tools required to make scalable, reliable AAA-quality games. The company was founded in 2016 by industry veterans who have engineered online systems for some of the largest game and distribution platforms in the world including Fortnite, Epic Store, Xbox Live, PlayStation Network, and EA Origin. We are backed by top investors including Softbank, Sony Interactive Entertainment, Galaxy Interactive, NetEase, and Krafton. Our latest Series B funding has firmly solidified our place as a top player in the gaming industry. AccelByte’s talent has decades of experience building and shipping some of the largest game and distribution platforms in the world.

We believe that the best companies empower employees to make decisions, obsess about the best user experience, and are not afraid to make and learn from their mistakes. Our culture is based on humility, openness to feedback, drive, and collaboration, which we feel results in the best performing teams. As a company that values diversity, inclusion, and employee growth, our employees have opportunities to work with and learn from teams all over the world. We offer competitive salaries, a full range of health benefits, social activities, career growth opportunities, and an amazing team. Come join us!

Position Summary

As UI/UX Designer III, you will be expected to design products such as admin dashboards, websites, desktop apps, and mobile websites based on the client's needs. You will have the opportunity to design compelling and creative experiences that strike a balance between the client's intent and the business’s needs. You will give it shape by defining the product vision through end-to-end experience design, setting a clear experience vision, working from concept through development, and working with cross-functional teams to achieve your goals. You will work closely with our world-class design team to ensure that we are building a world-class product.

Essential Functions/Responsibilities

The UI/UX Designer III is accountable for the following functions and responsibilities:

Deeply understand the product visions and know AccelByte or the client's product(s) from end to end. 
Design human-centric wireframes, mockups, and prototypes and communicate the design decision to achieve the goals and solve pain points. Design mock-ups and high-fidelity user interfaces and iterate rapidly
Conduct research with the team and incorporate insights into design decisions to fulfill user and business needs
Collaborate daily with a diverse set of specialists, including internal or external stakeholders to build a great user experience that balances business results with end-user delight
Create and maintain the design system or style guide
Participate in product spec brainstorming, suggest UX writing, and provide UI elements/assets to engineers
Participate in design reviews across the products or teams, you support by giving and receiving feedback
Interview and conduct portfolio reviews of the candidates to build an amazing team
Review and provide feedback to maintain a good interview process
Participate in design reviews across the products or teams you support by giving and receiving feedback
Proactively identify and influence to fix and close UX debt
Deliver high-fidelity outputs that are consistent, pixel-perfect, and dev-ready
Mentor Junior Designers both inside or outside your team(s) on how to approach design problems, solicit feedback, and drive for impactful outcomes
Perform other duties as assigned

Qualifications/Experience Required

Bachelor's Degree background or relevant work experience, certification, or courses.
At least 4 years of experience as a UI/UX designer.
Advanced experience in designing user interfaces for web applications or SaaS products.
Advanced experience in using UI/UX design software such as Figma, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe Illustrator.
Knowledgeable in UX writing and able to provide suggestions for good UX Writing.
Advanced experience in creating product or feature sitemaps, user flows, diagrams, and user journeys.
Advanced experience in information architecture.
Advanced experience using Figma features such as Styles, Auto Layout, Variants, Plugins, and Prototyping.
Advanced experience in creating and managing design tokens, components, patterns, and templates.
Advanced experience in designing wireframes, mockups, and prototyping.
Advanced experience in designing responsive user experiences.
Advanced experience in communicating design ideas to peers, stakeholders, and external clients.
Having the ability to understand, conduct, and participate in UX Research.
Advanced experience in collaboration tools such as Jira, Confluence, Miro, etc.
Advance experience with AccelByte products and services or similar.
Experience working in a multinational technology startup is preferred.
Eagerness to learn new tools and technologies.
Proficiency in written and verbal English.
Flexibility to adjust to work routines/schedules.

AccelByte Inc is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer, all qualified candidates and applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, gender, national origin, sexual orientation, marital status, age, or disability. Our culture is innovative and inclusive, and we value our people the highest.

Please visit our career page for a complete listing of our open positions https://accelbyte.io/careers
Skill: Information Architecture, Mockups, Prototyping, Site Maps, UX Research, User Experience (UX), User Experience Design (UED), User Flows, User Interface Design, and Wireframing

Job Details:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clientsDate: 7 Aug 2024

Service Line / Portfolios: Customer & Marketing

Location:

Kuala Lumpur, MY Jakarta, ID

Are you ready to unleash your potential?

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.

Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

What You Will Do

This role is with Deloitte Digital Southeast Asia. Across all clients and sectors, we believe great customer experiences create greater impact. That elevating the human experience creates enduring value, for the organization, for the customer, for society, for all.

The Project Manager will be responsible for planning, executing, and overseeing digital projects for our clients. You will work closely with clients, cross-functional teams, and stakeholders to ensure the successful delivery of projects that drive business growth and innovation.

You will:

Lead end-to-end project management for digital transformation initiatives, including scope definition, project planning, resource allocation, and risk management.
Collaborate with clients to understand their business objectives, business and technical requirements, and digital transformation agenda.
Develop and maintain project plans, timelines, and budgets to ensure project success and client satisfaction.
Lead and manage high-performing project teams, including business analysts, developers, designers, testers and other specialists.
Monitor project progress, track key performance indicators (KPIs), and ensure project milestones are met.
Identify and mitigate project risks, proactively addressing any issues that may impact project timelines or quality.
Serve as the main point of contact for clients, providing regular updates, addressing concerns, and managing expectations.
Foster strong client relationships and seek opportunities for upselling or expanding project scopes.
Stay current with emerging digital technologies and industry trends, applying relevant insights to projects.
Ensure project deliverables meet quality standards and are aligned with client expectations.
Prepare and present project status reports and performance metrics to senior management.

Enough About Us, Let's Talk About You

If you are someone with:

Bachelor's degree in business, technology, or a related field; PMP or other relevant certifications are a plus.
Minimum 5-8 years’ experience as a Project Manager, with a track record of successfully managing digital transformation projects. 
Hands-on experience with digital technologies, platforms, and tools. Able to comprehend both functional and technical requirements, provide high level solution approach and define technical architecture.
Strong understanding of consulting/project management best practices and trends.
Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills.
Exceptional problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and adapt to changing priorities.
Proficiency in project management software and collaboration tools.
Willingness to travel as needed to meet client requirements. 

Next Steps 

So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request for money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles that you are interested in via this official Deloitte website.

Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd is a member firm of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited. Deloitte in Malaysia, which is within the Deloitte Network, is the entity that is providing this Website.

Job Details:
Jet Commerce is a leading e-commerce ecosystem service company in emerging market countries in the Southeast Asia regions and Brazil. Providing all in services for brands to win emerging e-commerce markets. Jet Commerce assists brands and local sellers in growing their e-commerce businesses by providing end-to-end e-commerce solutions that prioritize the customer experience. In addition, Jet Commerce offers a variety of other services through its various business units, including Omnichannel System, Live Commerce, Warehousing and Fulfillment Service.

Jet Commerce currently operates in six Asian countries: Indonesia, Thailand, the Philippines, Vietnam, China, Malaysia, and many more to come.

Position: Graphic Designer

Overview: We are seeking a highly creative and skilled Graphic Designer to join our dynamic e-commerce enabler team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong portfolio that showcases their passion for illustrative design and typography. This role requires experience in various design platforms, including both digital and print media.

Responsibilities:
Logo and Design Creation: Develop compelling and effective logos, designs, and other visual content for both print and digital media.
Industry Awareness: Stay updated with current industry and technology standards, social media trends, competitive landscape, and market trends to ensure our designs remain relevant and innovative.
Digital Communication Design: Design across all digital communication channels, including social media, shop decoration, paid advertisements, and more.
Collaboration: Work closely and proactively with cross-functional team members in a fast-paced environment to ensure cohesive and impactful design strategies.
Strategic Design Planning: Contribute a strong point of view and excellent execution skills to shape design planning and strategy.
E-commerce Campaign Management: Oversee and manage e-commerce weekly campaigns and day-to-day activities, ensuring alignment with marketing strategies.
Marketing Strategy Integration: Understand and incorporate basic marketing strategic knowledge into design projects.

Qualifications:
Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design or a related field.
Professional Experience: 2-4 years of experience in graphic design, with a proven track record in creating high-quality work.
Technical Proficiency: Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.).
Skills: Excellent communication skills, strong conceptual thinking, exceptional design skills, and proficiency in motion graphics and digital imaging.
Portfolio: A strong portfolio showcasing a range of work in various design styles and platforms.
Skill: Adobe Creative Suite, Communication, Design, Graphic Design, Illustrative, Logo Design, Market Analysis, Paid Advertising, Plan Design, and Typography

Job Details:
Right Customer is seeking an experienced Digital Designer passionate about creating high-impact, visually appealing designs that capture attention and drive conversions on paid advertising. In this role, you will join a dedicated global team in producing top-quality visual assets for some of the most recognizable brands in the self-development space. The ideal candidate must have experience creating graphics and visual assets for paid advertising campaigns, handle fast turnarounds on projects, and excel under tight deadlines.

Roles & Responsibilities

Design high-converting static assets that align with the client's target audience and campaign objectives. 
Oversee the complete design process, from initial concept development to the final delivery, ensuring quality and consistency. 
Leverage Photoshop for basic photo manipulation, cropping people/assets from backgrounds, and retouching. 
Collaborate with copywriters, media buyers, and strategists to integrate text and visuals seamlessly, enhancing the overall impact of the ads. 
Use data-driven insights to refine designs and optimize their performance across all advertising channels. 
Prepare and export design assets tailored for various platforms, including banner display ads, social media ads, and YouTube thumbnails. 
Maintain organized source files for easy access and collaboration within the team. 
Provide design support for other marketing initiatives as needed. 

Requirements

Up-to-date portfolio demonstrating past work experience creating static assets for paid advertising. 
Minimum of 3 years in graphic design, with a focus on creating digital advertising materials. 
Expertise in using Adobe Creative Suite. 
Understanding of fundamental design principles such as typography, layout design, and color theory. 
Proven track record in direct response design, creating graphics that capture attention and drive conversions. 
Excellent English communication—both written and verbal. 
Ability to manage quick project turnarounds and thrive under stringent deadlines. 
Ability to work collaboratively within a team and take constructive feedback. 

The Ideal Candidate...

Exhibits meticulous attention to detail in all design work. 
Demonstrates a results-oriented mindset, consistently striving for high conversion rates. 
Possesses a strategic and innovative thought process, always seeking fresh design solutions. 
Shows a natural curiosity and willingness to experiment with new design styles. 
Utilizes data-driven insights to inform design decisions and optimize performance. 
A Team Player. 

If this sounds like you, we'd love to hear from you! Please fill out the application and our team will be in touch.
Skill: Color Theory, Direct Response Marketing, Graphic Design, Graphics, Image Editing, Layout Design, Online Advertising, Photo Retouching, Photography, and Typography

Job Details:
As a Graphic Designer at dentsu, you'll embrace the full spectrum of design, with a passion for seamlessly blending aesthetic appeal with user experience. As a key member of our creative team, you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping our creative output and bringing our visions to life. Your growing knowledge of how visual design intersects with user behavior will be essential in creating work that is not only beautiful but also highly effective. This role is about more than just design; it's about making an impact and helping our clients succeed through compelling and thoughtful creative solutions.

Job Title:

Graphic Designer

Job Description:

About Dentsu

Led by Dentsu Group Inc. (Tokyo: 4324; ISIN: JP3551520004), a pure holding company established on January 1, 2020, the Dentsu Group encompasses two operational networks: dentsu japan network, which oversees Dentsu’s agency operations in Japan, and dentsu international, its international business headquarters in London, which oversees Dentsu’s agency operations outside of Japan.

With a strong presence in approximately 145 countries and regions across five continents and with 65,000 dedicated professionals, the Dentsu Group provides a comprehensive range of client-centric integrated communications, media and digital services through its five leadership brands—Carat, dentsu X, iProspect, Dentsu Creative, and Merkle—as well as through Dentsu Japan Network companies, including Dentsu Inc., the world’s largest single brand agency with a history of innovation. The Group is also active in the production and marketing of sports and entertainment content on a global scale.

www.dentsu.com

About Dentsu Creative

Dentsu Creative operates in over [21] markets worldwide with more than [2,200] dedicated specialists. Bringing together our Japanese heritage in craft, data and technology, and our deep understanding of media and contemporary culture, Dentsu Creative is a new global creative agency. Born in Japan, raised in a digital world. We help transform brands and business through the power of Modern Creativity: which creates culture, changes society and invents the future and is accelerated by our deep specialist expertise in digital experience, earned attention and entertainment.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop final design assets such as social media posts, online ads, and other digital content. 
Present innovative design concepts to clients and internal teams. 
Conceptualize visuals based on client requirements and brand guidelines. 
Work closely with the agency's creative and production teams to produce final designs. 
Ensure all graphics and layouts are visually appealing and aligned with client branding. 
Engage with clients to understand their vision and deliver designs that meet their expectations. 


A bit about you:

Proven experience as a Graphic Designer, preferably in an agency setting. Experience in UI/UX design is highly preferred. 
Excellent understanding of composition, color theory, and typography. 
Strong portfolio showcasing a range of design projects. 
Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). 
Strong communication and presentation skills. 
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. 


Dentsu Values

Will live the dentsu 8 Ways at all times: We Dream Loud, We Inspire Change, We Team Without Limits, We All Lead, We Make It Real, We Climb High, We Choose Excitement, We Are A Force For Good

Inclusion and Diversity

We’re proud to be different and that starts with our people. We believe in equal opportunities for everyone. We won’t define people by their race, gender, sexual-orientation, age or disability. Individuality is what makes us great, we want everyone to bring their full self to work and create something amazing. That’s what we care about.

So, whether you’re joining us, or looking to move to a different part of the business, we work hard to make sure we create equal opportunities for everyone.

Keeping connected

Please visit our website to find out more and connect with us on social.

www.dentsu.com

Please include an updated CV in your application. 
We regret that only short-listed candidates will be notified. 


Location:

Jakarta

Brand:

Dentsu Creative

Time Type:

Full time

Contract Type:

Permanent

Job Details:
About Airwallex

Airwallex is the only unified payments and financial platform for global businesses. Powered by our unique combination of proprietary infrastructure and software, we empower over 100,000 businesses worldwide – including Brex, Rippling, Navan, Qantas, SHEIN and many more – with fully integrated solutions to manage everything from business accounts, payments, spend management and treasury, to embedded finance at a global scale.

Proudly founded in Melbourne, we have a team of over 1,500 of the brightest and most innovative people in tech located across more than 20 offices across the globe. Valued at US$5.6 billion and backed by world-leading investors including Sequoia, Lone Pine, Greenoaks, DST Global, Salesforce Ventures and Mastercard, Airwallex is leading the charge in building the global payments and financial platform of the future. If you're ready to do the most ambitious work of your career, join us.

About The Team

As a global engineering powerhouse, our teams are spread across Australia, China, USA, Netherlands, and Singapore, representing a vibrant mosaic of cultures and engineering viewpoints.

We are looking for a passionate, Senior Backend Engineer with an interest in building scalable, distributed financial infrastructure to lead the development of a new platform to power Airwallex Yield – a hotly anticipated product which provides seamless investment opportunities to customers looking to earn return on their cash.

This is an exciting greenfield opportunity to design and implement a scalable platform to support the rollout of Airwallex Yield across all customer regions and cohorts.

What You’ll Do

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will help define and implement our team’s engineering strategy which will include leading the selection and rollout of patterns and frameworks across the emerging Core Banking Yield squad.

As a team, we will own the client investment & settlement workflows (signup, investment, redemption), reconciliation control, unit registry / investment ledger and integration rails with our investment providers.

This role is based in Singapore.

Responsibilities

Lead the design, implementation & delivery across our lending platform to support the launch and scale up our embedded finance & credit cards products
Collaborate with a talented team of engineers to conduct architectural reviews, ensuring the highest quality and scalability of our solutions
Partner with the broader lending team to optimize our processes for productivity & quality.

Who You Are

We're looking for people who meet the minimum qualifications for this role. The preferred qualifications are great to have, but are not mandatory.

Minimum Qualifications

Have an interest in the financial domain
Have experience solving distributed systems challenges – scalability, consistency, latency
Enjoy engaging in collaborative multi-functional teams
Mastery of backend technologies is essential. While we do not mind what language you have most recently been using, we are using Kotlin w/ vert.x, Temporal & Kafka
Previously worked with automated tests and been involved in quality control processes.
Engaged with cloud technologies like (GCP/ AWS) with additional exposure to technologies like docker and Kubernetes
Experience integrating with observability tooling such as Splunk, NewRelic, Prometheus, Grafana
Fluent English communication skills

#bangkok, #hongkong, #jakarta, #shanghai, #singapore, #sydney, #taipei, #tokyo

Equal opportunity

Airwallex is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and anyone seeking employment at Airwallex is considered based on merit, qualifications, competence and talent. We don’t regard color, religion, race, national origin, sexual orientation, ancestry, citizenship, sex, marital or family status, disability, gender, or any other legally protected status when making our hiring decisions. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

Airwallex does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms/recruiters. Airwallex will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to specific open position(s). Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to Airwallex on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.
Skill: Apache Kafka, Back-End Web Development, Communication, English, Kotlin, New Relic, Programming, Software Development, System Performance, and Vert.x

About Wilkinson Marketing:
Wilkinson Marketing is a dynamic and innovative marketing agency specializing in brand management, production event planning, and strategic marketing initiatives. We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional results for our clients, including top-tier brands. We are currently seeking a dedicated and highly organized Account Executive to join our team and assist in managing our key accounts.

Job Description:
As an Account Executive at Wilkinson Marketing, you will play a crucial role in supporting the Account Manager with the Jägermeister account. Your primary responsibilities will involve managing production schedules, coordinating with third-party manufacturers, and overseeing venues and events. This position requires excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. The ideal candidate must be native to Bali or have extensive knowledge of the Bali nightlife scene and be comfortable commuting on a weekly basis to various venues around the island.

Key Responsibilities:
Assist the Account Manager in managing all aspects of the Jägermeister account.
Coordinate and maintain production schedules to ensure timely delivery of marketing materials and products.
Liaise with third-party manufacturers to ensure quality and adherence to brand standards.
Maintain clear and effective communication with clients, team members, and external partners.
Monitor project progress and provide regular updates to the Account Manager and clients.
Assist in the development of marketing strategies and campaigns.
Conduct market research and analysis to support strategic decision-making.

Requirements:
Recent graduate with a degree in marketing, event management, hospitality, or a related field.
Native to Bali or extensive knowledge of the Bali nightlife scene.
Based in Bali (Currently living in Bali).
Willing and able to commute weekly to various locations and venues around the island.
Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Eagerness to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.
Attention to detail and a proactive approach to problem-solving.
Previous experience in internships or part-time roles in event planning, marketing, or hospitality is a bonus, but not required.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work with a prestigious global brand.
Collaborative and supportive work environment.
Professional growth and development opportunities.
Exciting and dynamic work environment in Bali, Indonesia.

Benefits:
BPJS Ketenagakerjaan
THR (Tunjangan Hari Raya)
Annual leave
Training & Courses Allowance
Opportunities to develop with the company

How to Apply:
If you are a motivated and detail-oriented professional looking to make an impact with a leading marketing agency, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your qualifications and experience.

Wilkinson Marketing is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
Skill: Corporate Events, Event Management, Event Marketing Strategy, Event Planning, Event Production, Live Event Production, Live Events, Marketing Event Planning, and Private Events

Job Titles: Freelance Player Support Agent - English/Indonesian Speaker
Job Details:
TransPerfect Gaming Division is an award-winning multilingual video games services company dedicated to world-class translation, localization, player support, games testing, cybersecurity, tool development, art design, and community management services. Our successful community management and player support departments support countless exciting games and titles worldwide, helping developers to manage their communities in multiple languages, while our localization department helps bring games of all genres to the world in over 50 languages.

Are you looking to work on building and raising online communities? Does your true passion lie in video games and online gaming? What if you could combine your hobby with your professional expertise?

Our player support department supports over 1,000 games developers across the globe. We’re currently looking for a dynamic addition to our vibrant team of over 1,000 in-house player support agents who can provide top class support in a fast-paced and active environment.

Responsibilities:
Plan on social postings and interact with players on the official social channels for the title
Create or assist in creating visual assets and copywriting for the social postings
Respond to the live game issues that occur in the game and write up appropriate notices on the forum and social channels when necessary
Work closely with other GMs, Customer Support and Community Managers to solicit feedback and suggestions for the game improvement from the community
Monitor and regularly report on the live-service issues and the players feedback
Monitor regularly live-streaming channels and social channels and work closely with partner influencers
Monitor Discord channels and facilitate the community moderators
Internal point of escalation for agents
Main point of client contact

Required Skills and Qualifications 
Fluency in English & Indonesian 
Experience in video game industry, especially in community management, customer support, QA, or related field
Experience in the social media management (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, etc.)
Prior experience/interactions with the gaming communities – forum or user groups on social channels
Experience in social content creation and posting, publishing calendars, asset creation, copywriting, reporting & analytics
Strong customer service ethic and great inter-personal communication skills
Writing skills for the announcements or forum notices
Ability to act fast on problems or communications and deliver the best results amid a fast-paced, high-volume environment
Creativity, curiosity, and a willingness to learn and grow
Professional and mature demeanour along with strong time-management and organization skills for coordinating multiple initiatives and priorities

Desired Skills and Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in communications, marketing, or any equivalent work experience
Content creator, cosplayer or live-streaming experience within the videogame community
Graphic design or video production/editing skills
Management/team leading experience
Skill: Bahasa Indonesia, Communication, Customer Support, English, Gaming, Online Gaming, Organization Skills, Social Media, and Video Games

Job Titles: Audience Development Executive, Indonesia - MEDIA RELATIONS Focused, NOT Writing or (Digital) Marketing Related
Job Details:
Cision employs the brightest, most passionate people in the tech industry. We’d love for you to join our growing team! We invest in our people through training and professional development while supporting you along the way—all so you can meet your career goals. To us, the most important measure of our success is yours.

What We Offer

This role, within PR Newswire (a Cision company), empowers you to lead Indonesia's media relations by fostering relationships with reporters and cultivating strong partnerships across all media publications.

 Indonesia market focused
 Exposure to diverse clients across all industries
 Remote working
 Friendly & Flexible working environment
 Company Private Health Insurance Allowance provided
 Public holiday plus Company wellness day

Primary Duties & Responsibilities

As an Audience Development Executive, you will reach out to the media including journalists, editors, bloggers and any content creator to introduce PR Newswire’s services for the media.
Expand PR Newswire Asia’s distribution network to online websites, bloggers, database, multimedia channels and financial terminals in Indonesia.
Assist our client services and marketing team if/when required.
Managing existing content partners and media relations in Indonesia

Desired Skills and Experience:

Fluent speaking and writing in English and Bahasa Indonesia
3-5 years of experience in related functions, preferably in the areas of PR agencies, media relations or media industry
Energetic, digital savvy and passionate for the media industry. A fast learner.
High level of self-motivation, energy and accountability; strong ability to work both independently and as a team member in a fast-paced working environment.
Excellent interpersonal, communication skills and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in Internet and PC software, especially MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint.
Candidates with more experience will be considered as Senior Audience Development Executive

As a global leader in PR, marketing and social media management technology and intelligence, Cision helps brands and organizations to identify, connect and engage with customers and stakeholders to drive business results. PR Newswire , a network of over 1.1 billion influencers, in-depth monitoring, analytics and its Brandwatch and Falcon.io social media platforms headline a premier suite of solutions. Cision has offices in 24 countries throughout the Americas, EMEA and APAC. For more information about Cision's award-winning solutions, including its next-gen Cision Communications Cloud®, visit www.cision.com and follow @Cision on Twitter.

Cision is committed to fostering an inclusive environment where all employees can be their authentic selves and perform at their best. We believe diversity, equity, and inclusion is vital to driving our culture, sparking innovation and achieving long-term success. Cision is proud to have joined more than 600 companies in signing the CEO Action for Diversity & Inclusion™ pledge and named a “Top Diversity Employer” for 2021 by DiversityJobs.com .

Cision is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, seeking to create a welcoming and diverse environment. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status, or other protected statuses.

Please review our Global Candidate Data Privacy Statement to learn about Cision’s commitment to protecting personal data collected during the hiring process.

Job Details:
Job Overview

We're on the hunt for a Senior UX/UI Designer who thrives in transforming concepts and ideas into visually appealing and user-friendly websites and landing pages. You'll play a crucial role in our team, bringing a blend of artistic design and practical user experience. This role is perfect for someone who is detail-oriented, creative, and ready to take on the challenge of elevating our brand's digital footprint.

About Right Customer

Right Customer is one of the fastest-growing performance marketing studios in the United States, working with top social media influencers and creators to reach millions of individuals daily. As designers at heart, we employ our creative skills to fuel actionable growth for our clients, partners, and owned brands.

What You'll Be Doing

Guiding Visual Direction: You'll lead the way in setting the style and design standards for our digital projects. 
Crafting Digital Experiences: Your main task will be to design intuitive and appealing websites and landing pages, focusing on user engagement and visual appeal. 
Generating Creative Assets: You'll create compelling graphics and visuals, adding a unique flair to our digital content. 
Collaborating for Success: Partner with our development team to ensure your designs are executed perfectly, fostering a synergistic work environment. 
Staying Ahead of the Curve: Keep yourself updated with the latest design trends, experimenting with new concepts to keep our brand fresh and relevant. 

Who You Are

A Seasoned UX/UI Expert: With at least 3 years under your belt, you have a strong background in UX/UI design, showcased in your diverse portfolio. 
Figma Savvy: You're not just familiar with Figma; you excel in it, using it as your primary tool for creating stunning designs. 
Toolbox Versatility: Beyond Figma, you're adept in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, broadening your design capabilities. 
A Collaborative Mindset: You excel in working alongside developers, known for your organization and smooth project handoffs. 
A Great Communicator: Fluent in English, you can easily articulate your ideas and collaborate effectively with a team. 
A Growth-Oriented Individual: Always eager to learn and adapt, you're looking for a place where you can evolve and contribute meaningfully over the long term. 

Benefits

As a remote-first position with our US-based company, we're committed to offering a comprehensive benefits package that supports both your professional and personal well-being. Here's what you can expect:

Competitive Pay: Your salary will be reflective of your experience, ensuring fair and rewarding compensation. 
Unlimited Paid Time Off: Enjoy the flexibility of unlimited holidays, vacation days, and sick leave to maintain a healthy work-life balance. 
Ongoing Training & Development: We invest in your growth through continuous learning and development opportunities. 
Regular Salary Increases: As you grow with us, your salary will too, with periodic increases to recognize your contributions. 
Performance Bonuses: Your hard work doesn't go unnoticed – expect bonuses for outstanding performance. 
Growth Potential: As our company expands, so do your career opportunities, opening doors for professional advancement. 
Remote Work Flexibility: Experience the convenience and comfort of working remotely, connecting with a dynamic team from anywhere. 

Join us and be part of a team where your growth is our priority, and your work is both valued and rewarded.
Skill: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Communication, Design Standards, Figma (Software), Landing Pages, New Concepts, User Experience (UX), User Interface Design, and Visual Direction

Job Details:
Requirements :
1.Knowledge of how to execute a user-centered design process.
2.Expertise in developing wireframes and prototypes.
3.Extensive knowledge of user research and user testing methods.
4.Mastery of design thinking, user-centered design and other principles.
5.Ability to craft specific visual design elements for products.
6.Experience overseeing junior UX design team members.

Job Description :
1.Take a step back and see things from a broader perspective to manage and direct given projects.
2.Identify and evaluate potential opportunities to improve existing web, apps, mobile and interactive designs.
3.Work with junior designers to monitor and ensure development of consistent user experience across all areas of the company.
4.Own overall end-to-end user experience - from the big picture (owning the overall user experience and consistency across an entire product) down to specifics of UI layout for a feature or service flow.
5.Develop detailed wireframes, user flows, mockups, and other product deliverables to effectively communicate designs and product requirements.
6.Envision and develop intuitive, scalable, and engaging interactions and experience designs for multiple platforms (web and mobile).
7.Communicate designs – Create meaningful UX deliverables such as sketching, storyboards, sitemaps, wireframes, flowcharts, prototypes, presentations that help the team understand what to build and why.
8.Take the role of a mentor to more junior designers.
9.Understand and utilize on-going mobile applications’ & web design analytics.
Skill: Coding Experience, Graphic Design, Prototyping, User Experience (UX), and User Interface Design

Job Details:
RWS Global Creative Production team, is a full-service, creative content production agency that works with brands and agencies to amplify and extend integrated campaigns across any market, any channel and any media. We work as part of the world’s leading provider of technology-enabled language, content management and IP services. With over 68 offices in 39 countries and over 7000 employees.
We require an accomplished designer with agency-level work history, who is a native speaker from one of the 9 target markets with an understanding of their own country and markets’ nuances and style to ensure their designs will resonate with the target language/market audience.

Canva is a graphic design platform that provides tools for creating social media graphics, presentations, promotional merchandise and websites. We seek designers who can work from design exploration through to design execution for creation of templates and advertising content including digital animation, design, image searching and artwork. You must possess the ability to manage multiple projects and tasks simultaneously, in a fast-paced role within a remote global creative team.

The graphic designer role will report into the central London UK team. This role will be servicing one key client remotely, working directly into the 3rd party cloud-based design software to produce the work.

Key Responsibilities 
Design ability to execute agency-level creative solutions within brand guidelines and within budget.
Apply cultural knowledge to designing contemporary and relevant content.
Bi-lingual English and Native (local) language speaker.
Ability to work quickly and efficiently on multiple projects without compromising quality.
Ability to manage client expectations by building and maintaining an open dialogue.
Takes ownership for their work.

Key Competencies 
Creativity: Has experience creating a variety of materials including for digital social and online - static and animated, print, presentations etc. Considers the cultural and aesthetic look and feel of any document and provide alternative creative design solutions where appropriate.
Quality: Demonstrates a desire for creating quality and current designs. Ensures all projects undergo studio QC process.
Technical skills: Experienced in template creation and use of AI in design. Stays abreast of industry trends and updates as it relates to relevant software and hardware. Understands and works within network systems and procedures. 
Time management: Demonstrates effective time management skills and ability to manage several projects simultaneously whilst keeping within time budgeted for tasks.
Client focus: Demonstrate client-focused approach to providing agency-level creative. Build effective client relationships based on trust, flexibility, and professionalism.
Judgement: Exhibits sound decision-making capability, considering broader implications of proposed actions and alternative solutions.
Drive and enthusiasm: Exhibits energy and enthusiasm. Determined to achieve results and is prepared to put in extra effort as required.

Technical Skills 
Advanced skills in Canva or similar required
Other 3rd party cloud-based design template software
Working knowledge of MS Office software, Excel, Word, and PowerPoint

Educational Requirement 
Degree or similar in Graphic Design, Design, Arts
Skill: Canva, Desktop Template Creation, Graphic Design, and Multilingual

Job Titles: TikTok LIVE - Livestream Operations Manager - Indonesia (Based in Jakarta)
Job Details:
Responsibilities

 TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us

Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.

Join us.

We are looking for passionate and talented people to join the TikTok LIVE Operations team and support in our mission to inspire creativity and bring joy.

The LIVE Operations team is obsessed with everything to do with TikTok LIVE. From content strategy, monetization, gifting, LIVE features, data analysis, creating campaigns and ensuring a fun and safe space for all of our LIVE users.

Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for livestreaming local operations, with responsibilities such as:
- Set the guidelines and strategy for local agencies and MCNs, influencers, users, campaigns and partnerships
- Establish and maintain partnerships with local content providers, building "Live+" ecosystem through establishing good collaborative relationships with local brands or companies
2. Explore new campaign strategies and models, plan and launch Live streaming campaigns by following up popular topics, events, social hot issues etc
3. Responsible for introducing, management, and developing of platform/agencies/platform anchors Responsible for user growth of TikTok live, improve user retention, consumption rate and ARPU value through management of user's life cycle
4. Participate in drafting and revising related policies of agencies/talents/influencers management. negotiating contracts and cooperating with content partners; 

Qualifications

 1. Bachelor's degree or above. Min. 3 years' experience in content, marketing or partnerships roles in tech & media industry.
2. Candidates who's used to work with, or have the connections with modeling, media, TV, celebrities and live streaming applications are preferred.
3. Experience in building and managing a team from scratch is preferred.
4. Strong business acumen in emerging industries; Team management experience in entertainment industry is preferred.
5. Strong analytical skills and data-driven.
6. Good communications and interpersonal skills, able to work in an international and diverse environment.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
Skill: Communication, Content Strategy, Digital Marketing, English, Influencer Marketing, Interpersonal Relationships, Interpersonal Skills, Service Operations, Social Media Blogging, and Social Media Marketing

Job Details:
As a Technical Account Manager (TAM), you will serve as a pivotal customer service interface, dedicated to ensuring the stability and growth of our clients’ cloud-business operations. Your role will involve working closely with the Alibaba Cloud team to prioritize and address customer requests, issues, and feature enhancements promptly.

Job Description:
Standardized Operations:
- Ensure the stability and security of customer cloud platforms through comprehensive risk governance, timely product updates, upgrades, and efficient emergency fault response.
- Optimize cloud resources and performance, enhancing cloud operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
- Advocate for continuous product operation improvements, simplifying cloud management and empowering customers with sustainable cloud platform maintenance capabilities.

Cloud Migration Support:
- Guide customers through their cloud migration journey, leveraging our expertise in application and big data architecture, database localization, performance tuning, data governance, and platform construction.
- Offer industry-specific best practices and solutions to maximize cloud utilization.

Cloud Optimization (Public Cloud):
- Develop and refine system architectures, ensuring business continuity, disaster recovery capabilities, system monitoring, and regular recovery drills for optimal stability and reliability.
- Adopt intelligent monitoring and alerting to boost business efficiency and user experience.

Standardized Technical Operations:
- Provide end-to-end cloud technology support, including cost optimization, maturity assessments, compliance, security enhancements, and consulting services to fortify customers' cloud operations.

Expert Services:
- Deliver best practices, solution consulting, and services tailored to Alibaba Cloud’s intelligent products.
- Assist customers in enhancing their cloud product operations and usage proficiency, supporting successful cloud migrations with effective tools and strategies.

Job Requirements
- Bachelor (or above) degree in CS or Engineering.
- Over 5 years of experience in solution development, architectural design, server-side development, and operational tasks within enterprise groups.
- Solid technical expertise in large-scale application development or operations with cloud product foundations.
- Proficiency in technical domains such as cloud-native technologies, big data, databases, networking, middleware, and the architecture of main business line products.
- Capability to understand and design cross-product system architectures and effectively solve related issues.
- Ability to recognize customer categories and maintain tailored communication and problem resolution strategies, ensuring satisfaction at all levels, including senior management.
- Strong operational management skills, focusing on system optimization to maximize cloud platform stability and efficiency.
- Competence in coordinating both internal and external stakeholders, managing customer or complex internal projects, adhering to SLAs, and achieving high satisfaction.
- Systematic and comprehensive solution design and architectural skills catered to complex technical environments.
- Excellence in decomposing complex technical issues into actionable solutions and system architecture designs for single-product technical scenarios.
- Expertise in applying practical cases and custom optimization solutions for customer-specific business scenarios, such as high availability.

The TAM we are looking for will create a communicative environment, excelling in distilling communication points, effective listening, and clear expression of ideas. With a dynamic service-oriented mindset, you're committed to seeing customer issues through to resolution. If you have a blend of technical proficiency, customer-facing experience, and the drive to deliver exceptional solutions, we want you on our team.
Skill: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Architectural Design, Customer Satisfaction (CSAT), Enterprise Solution Design, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Microsoft Azure, Post-Sales Support, Server Side, Technical Accounting, and Technical Solution Design

Job Details:
Company Description

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Get to know the Team

We are a high-performing team of passionate, fun-loving, and hardworking individuals with varied backgrounds who come together to support a common mission: Enable Grab to deliver faster, better, and efficiently with each and every rollout. Our team is largely based in Singapore and our team members are spread across various countries managing multiple initiatives to deliver features that touch the everyday lives of millions of customers across Southeast Asia through Grab.

Job Description

Get to know the role

We are looking for a QA Engineer for Food and Supermarket product testing. We believe a successful candidate has experience as QA engineer / Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer in Test and familiar with one of the test scripts Python/Golang/Java experiment for product automation, but if you believe you have what it takes then we’d love to hear from you either way. This role is required because we are supporting the critical path and continually growing business. In return, you will get an opportunity to work with a creative team and help Southeast Asia people have a better life.

The Day-to-Day Activities

Define test plans, test specifications, test suites, test cases as well as proposed tools for functional, security and performance testing in a programmatic manner.
Understand the product/feature in-depth from the end-user point of view and the underlying implementation.
Work closely with the Product Manager, Front End, and Backend developers to understand the feature and the implementation to derive and execute feature tests and impacted feature test cases.
Debug failed test cases by analyzing logs and API responses and report bugs with details. Follow-up on bugs to closure.
Execute & maintain UI (Web, Mobile app) and API automation suites. Debug and correct script and data issues in automation suites.
Understand automation framework and add automation test cases for the new features and regression test cases

Qualifications

Preferably a degree in computer science, software engineering, information technology or related fields
3+ years of experience as QA Engineer/ Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer in Test
Should be able to work efficiently and effectively in a fast-paced dynamic team environment
Excellent communication, collaboration and analytical skills in English
Perform testing of iOS, Android apps and Backend API’s to ensure that product meets requirements
Should have a deeper understanding of the product at the implementation level, should be able to analyze logs and API responses in the Micro-Service integration level.
Should have coding experience and hands-on with automation (Web, Mobile app and API automation)
Understanding of database concepts and queries (MySQL)
Should have exposure to Agile and weekly sprint and release working models.
Knowledge of Tools: Charles, Postman, UI Automation Tools (Selenium, Appium, etc..), Testing Frameworks (Mocha, TestNG, etc.), object-oriented programming languages (Java, Golang) or any script languages (Python, Shell)

Additional Information

Our Commitment

We recognize that with these individual attributes come different workplace challenges, and we will work with Grabbers to address them in our journey towards creating inclusion at Grab for all Grabbers.
Skill: Android Development, Communication, Manual Testing, Mobile Applications, Quality Assurance, Regression Testing, Service Integration, Software Testing, Test Cases, and Test Planning

Job Titles: Customer Information System Support & Implementation Specialist at Dimata
Job Details:
Company Description:

Dimata, a leading software development company, is looking for a Customer Support & Implementation Specialist to join our dynamic team. If you are passionate about providing excellent customer service, implementing cutting-edge information management systems, and training users to maximize the benefits of technology, this role is for you.

What You’ll Do:

- Provide top-notch technical support to our customers, including system software, database and infrastructure support.
- Lead system implementation projects, ensuring smooth integration and operation.
- Conduct user training and create engaging training materials.
- Actively engage with customers to understand their needs and offer solutions.

What We’re Looking For:

A tech-savvy professional with a Bachelor’s degree in IT or related fields.
Strong troubleshooting skills and experience in IT support and system support.
Excellent communication skills and a customer-focused approach.
Open mind and fast learning of information system and business use cases
A minimum of 1 years of experience in customer IT system support or IT system implementation.

Why Join Us?

At Dimata, you’ll have the opportunity to work on innovative projects, engage with diverse clients, and contribute to the growth of our company while advancing your career in a supportive and dynamic environment.

Apply Now! If you’re ready to take the next step in your career and make a difference, we’d love to hear from you.
